Negative Reviews: New trend of bathrooms with glass doors. The doors do not really separate the bathroom from the room and the ventilation in the bathroom is really really weak. We had two rooms and we had the same problem.
Positive Reviews: The staff- from the doorman, up to the breakfast servers. The location and the view are amazing and rooms are spacious and clean.

Review Title: Excellent stay with family - highly recommend
Negative Reviews: No indoor pool which we knew before we arrived, but I guess for a hotel of this size would have been nice as Outdoor Pool closed (due to out of season stay), so having both would be great addition and provide options for guests
Positive Reviews:
Excellent location
Breakfast variety superb
Friendly & helpful staff
Exceptionally clean
Rooftop Bar has great views and staff really kind to the children with their own sweets pots :-)

Review Title: top location and staff but rooms expensive
Negative Reviews: rooms were a bit basic and not warm enough. bathroom excellent
Positive Reviews:
great location with stunning roof top bar. 
top class bathrooms 
fabulous staff from the cleaners to the reception team. great breakfast buffet.

Negative Reviews: Sometimes the waiting time for any of 6 lifts is very long. The TV was set literally in the middle of our room which made it impossible to watch TV from both beds at the same time. The safe in the room was initially not working due to batteries left inserted the wrong way.
Positive Reviews: The location was superb with many primary landmarks and attractions in walking distance. The underground and numerous busses are just at a corner. The view is magnificent. The priority access to sky bar for the guests is a life saving perk on Friday and Saturday nights. The staff is plenty, easy to find and very helpful. Breakfast is of descent variety and good quality. The checkout took less than 3 seconds. The main bed was enormously large and pretty comfortable. The furniture in the room was sufficient to keep the room tidy. The bottles with drinking water are delivered every day regardless of the fact the tap water is drinkable.
Room Type: Superior Deluxe King Room with View

Negative Reviews:
Room was a bit drafty, probably due to the old windows.
In order to get the vent/AC going, one must first use a lot of force to close the windows and get them correctly positioned. You usually succeed only after a couple of tries.
Positive Reviews: Spatious room with beautiful view to the Plaza Espana. Rooftop view was spectacular. The staff is nice and helpful. One of the best breakfasts, has many choices. Perfect location, exactly what we wanted.

Negative Reviews: The pillows in the room. Too soft. I struggled to sleep well, but that’s just me.
Positive Reviews: This hotel was amazing. When I booked it I hadn’t realised it had the breath taking sky bar so that was a major bonus. The staff were excellent , the room very nice. We were on the 21st floor which was quieter and had great views. Location was very good and we were able to walk everywhere. Breakfasts were super. So much choice. Totally worth every penny that we paid. The sky bar was superb. Busy so you have to pick your time. The 360 views of Madrid were fantastic. Would totally recommend this hotel and intend to stay there again. I was fascinated by the lift system. Very clever.

Review Title: We loved our stay. Already planning when we can come back!
Negative Reviews: Only issue was we couldn’t work the air conditioning so room not as cool as we’d like.
Positive Reviews: Location was perfect and beyond expectation. Breakfast delicious and all staff we met were very polite, attentive and helpful. Room was immaculate, bathroom so spacious and shower lovely. Great touch to have bottle of water replaced each day.

Review Title: Great location, great breakfast, great staff and great breakfast.
Negative Reviews: Room was too warm for us from UK.
Positive Reviews:
Great location. All important monuments and park are within walking distance of 15-20 mts of gradual pace.
All the plazas like de Sol, isabella2 etc are within walking distance. Lots of eating places are within easy reach by walk. Rooms are average size for delux king room but toilet with shower are of good size. Rooms are cleaned daily. The room is hot with no air con as it’s supposed to be winter. We stayed on 22 floor and kept windows open and still it was hot. Hotel may consider providing a fan. Hotel has sky bar with glass bridge n glass balcony for excellent views. The breakfast was great with many items and staff in the kitchen were friendly. There’s A & B section for sending guests to breakfast. The guest no can be as high as 2000.

Great place to stay.

Review Title: High quality hotel in the centre of Madrid with perfect services and a exceptional nice rooftopbar
Negative Reviews:
We basicaly liked everything about the hotel.  
If I had to give a point for improvement it the pool. Although very nice, it was a bit too small for the size of the hotel and the number of people staying in it.
Positive Reviews:
Breakfast was very good. Very well organised by the staff, very clean and a very divers offer of food and fresh fruit
The rooftopbar was really exceptional and one of the top-spots with a 360 degree view over Madrid. Only for this, I would return to this hotel.

Review Title: Enjoyed our stay very much, there won't be may better places to stay in Madrid.
Negative Reviews: Corridors to rooms wee a little dull/drab.
Positive Reviews: Reception/bar area was impressive, decor stunning. Door staff friendly and helpful. Elevators quick to access and to travel between floors. Superb roof top bar with magnificent views over Madrid, especially after dark. Clean/good pool/solarium area. Good breakfast, very nice dining room. Hotel location excellent.

Review Title: Outstanding hotel in a great location with a fantastic rooftop terrace.
Negative Reviews:
It's expensive, but you definitely get what you pay for.   
I still wonder why they bother with that light that keeps coming on in the bathroom when it detects motion but I'm getting used to it.
Positive Reviews: This is really an excellent hotel.   Great location at Plaza de Espana.   The room was outstanding - very large comfortable bed, fantastic views to the west.   The rooftop terrace is an incredible attraction.   The breakfast is really high quality and included all my favourites.    The staff was very helpful any time I asked.
Room Type: Superior Deluxe King Room with View

Review Title: perfect for romantic getaway in Madrid
Negative Reviews: the only negative was that you could hear everyone walking by the corridor outside our bedroom. This is due to the floor covering not being sound absorbing.
Positive Reviews: location of hotel is perfect for a city break. cleanliness of room and the standard of breakfast was very high with great variety. staff were friendly and efficient. sky bar is an added bonus with amazing views over Madrid. would highly recommend

Negative Reviews:
Booked king room and was given a twin room. Could have insisted we got what we booked but was only there 2 nights so let it go. 
Only one pillow per person in room and pillows were pretty poor quality compared to everything else in the hotel. Possible 1 pillow was due to covid and we could perhaps have asked for more, but extra pillows are usually available in the room.
Positive Reviews: Upmarket spotlessly clean hotel and yet excellent value for money. Friendly helpful staff. Good location. Fantastic rooftop bar. Great breakfast.

Negative Reviews: Only negative was the TV in the room was not a smart TV.
Positive Reviews: Great location, very comfortable rooms we had one over looking the Plaza de España. Excellent buffet breakfast and very friendly staff. Highly recommend.

Review Title: we enjoyed our stay at the hotel very much and was very pleased with the proximity to metro system and short walking dis
Negative Reviews: I didn’t care for the pillows but the bed was very comfortable
Positive Reviews: the room was great and we especially enjoyed the view and fare at the sky bar atop the hotel. the staff was very kind and helpful and the buffet breakfast was delicious with a large variety of food and beverage options.

Negative Reviews: In-room coffee & tea facilities. We only had two cups / glasses when we booked for 4. Tea, coffees, etc was never restocked
Positive Reviews: Location, breakfast, friendly staff, good size room, sky bar, quiet rooms, reception open when we arrived at midnight due to delayed flight

Negative Reviews: More sunbeds around the pool or book via reservations so all guests can access this facility.
Positive Reviews: Room was spacious and clean. Toiletries were useful as we only travelled with hand luggage. Breakfast options were fantastic and staff were helpful and friendly. Bed and pillows were comfortable and air conditioning worked well. The view from the room was amazing! Location was perfect to explore the city centre by walking.

Review Title: A great place to stay in Madrid
Negative Reviews:
Some relatively small, but important details that, in my opinion, would make it all absolutely perfect:
Practically nowhere to hang more than one large towel in the bathroom. And that only hook is at the quite opposite side of the bath, not at all close to the shower. There were three of us and getting the towel after the shower wasn´t easy. Please, think of a couple of hooks on the side wall of the shower.
The AC only worked to cool down, not to warm up. It´s unacceptable not to allow the guests to use the AC as they please in a 4 stars. 
The beds were only made with bed linen and it wasn´t that warm, especially since we couldn't use the AC to warm up. After asking some duvets, we were brought blankets. I don't think a blanket instead of a duvet is quite OK. 
The sofa is very firm for sleeping and quite squeaky by the way, a softer top mattress would be a great detail.
Positive Reviews: Overall great stay. Fantastic location, large, clean rooms, comfortable beds (except for the sofa bed), excellent breakfast, great service, soundproof windows (which is very, very important detail when overlooking Gran Vía and Plaza de España), blackout curtains, courtesy bottle of water, coffee (including decaff) and tea in room. Absolutely fabulous place to stay without any doubt. Highly recommend it.

Negative Reviews: Our room was near the elevators, so there was some noise from hotel guests, particularly during early morning hours. The hotel didn't provide bathrobes and slippers. The responsible for seating the guests at the rooftop bar was not flexible at all, despite the fact that the re were many tables free during our visit. The bed's matress could have been more comfortable.
Positive Reviews: Great location, city center, at Plaza Espagna. Nice view of the Plaza from our room. We've selected a family room (equivalent of  a suite) that was comfortable with a spacious bathroom. The air-conditioning was noiseless and very efficient. The breakfast buffet had a very good selection of foodstuff and beverages, including  fresh juice. The customer service desk was very helpful in booking guided tours and visits. A nice roof top bar on the 26th floor had amazing 360o city views with indoor and outdoor citing areas.

Negative Reviews: Pool left a lot to be desired. It is tiny for a hotel this size and so crowded.
Positive Reviews: Loved the roof top bar. Family room was spacious, clean and comfortable. Breakfast was delicious, big selection. Location was perfect! Staff were friendly and accomodating.

Review Title: An excellent hotel with superb service; ideally located for a vacation in Madrid.
Negative Reviews: High tech elevators were a bit annoying.  Lobby is small for such a large hotel so frequently crowded.  Energy efficient room, so powered down when vacant.  While supportive of the green approach, this made it impossible to charge electronic devices when out of the room.  Perhaps a single outlet for low energy draw could be left enabled.
Positive Reviews: Perfect location near Royal Palace, shopping, restaurants, Puerta del Sol and Plaza Mayor.  Spectacular views from upper rooms and sky bar.  Modern, clean, comfortable room with superb service.  Good breakfast with extensive buffet choices and excellent staff.

Negative Reviews: Room spacious enough but flooring would not be out of place in an hostel. Towels are equally out of place for a 'luxury ' hotel. Workmen were drilling until 11pm close to our bedroom despite several calls to reception to complain. It's always difficult to be a little negative without appearing to be a person never satisfied. Overall happy with this choice and there was much to be delighted with but the overriding impression is that some aspects particularly relating to the room furnishings and build quality do not warrant very close inspection for what purports to be a premium hotel.
Positive Reviews: Pleasant staff, breakfast amazing. Location perfect. High tech lifts something else. Expectations for Riu Plaza Espagne were high and were met on a number of levels. Would we return here? No. I  suspect that the hotel has some floors/rooms reserved for guests paying below rack rate; Booking.com rate was highly competitive at time of making the reservation.

Review Title: Very pleasant stay in a centrally located Madrid hotel - excellent value!
Negative Reviews: no complains
Positive Reviews:
The hotel is clean and provides very good amenities. Hotel's staff is pleasant and helpful. Location is also very good. 
Riu Sky Bar on the top of the building is great. The hotel patrons have unrestricted access to it. Every night there is a long line of people who want to visit the bar (these who do not stay in the hotel).
The greatest thing about this place is the value. This is an excellent hotel located very well within one of the most popular European capitals, and yet it charges very reasonable rates (including breakfast which is excellent). I think this is not by accident. I believe it is a strategic decision by Riu team to make this place full, busy and vibrant even when overall travel is significantly depressed due to pandemic.

Review Title: Great location and value for the money
Negative Reviews:
Sirens
People celebrating on the square at night
Positive Reviews:
Great location 
Great rooms 
Fantastic breakfast 
Great staff 
Don’t miss the rooftop bar

The Facility is centrally located, the front desk is exceptionally helpful and warm, rooms are clean and comfortable, the restaurants in Weir are beautiful with great views, although busy.￼ great stay!

Negative Reviews: The pool water temperature is very cold.
Positive Reviews:
All the staff were very welcoming, 5 star quality.
The room was great, the bed comfortable and the bathroom spacious and lovely.
The Skybar has amazing views and the food and drinks are very nice.
Room Type: Superior Deluxe King Room with View

Review Title: Excellent buffet breakfast and comfortable rooms
Positive Reviews: I received what I paid for. Great room with excellent amenities. Excellent buffet breakfast. I had dinner at the gastro pub restaurant and it was delicious. Staff in the restaurant and hotel was very polite. I also visited the 360 rooftop bar. There I had to wait a bit to order my drink. It seems like it gets quite crowded since the views are amazing up there, but my wait was about 10 minutes. My bed was comfortable and did not experience any noise. Excellent for resting after a long day.

Negative Reviews: my stay wasn’t longer!
Positive Reviews: could not rate this hotel highly enough. from the moment we got out the taxi from the airport to leaving it was perfect. we were on the 17th floor which gave amazing views. staff were friendly, rooms so clean, breakfast was amazing. the roof top bar was stunning. 100% will be back and wouldn’t stay anywhere else.

absolutely everything, the hotel is amazing the staff are so lovely, the rooms are fantastic and the 360 bar just WOW the views from the bar again just WOW, the breakfast is amazing so much choice. I am coeliac and they cater for this, definitely 100% recommend, would def book again
Room Type: Deluxe Superior King Room with Terrace

Negative Reviews: I couldn't fault the place.
Positive Reviews: Great location. Great choice of breakfast. Have to try the skybar experience. Staff were all a credit to the hotel, metro right outside the main door, I'd stay here again. Spotless hotel, excellent shower facilities etc

Review Title: This is a fantastic hotel, one of the best I've ever stayed in.
Negative Reviews: I have no negative comments to make regarding this hotel. In fact I still can't get over how little we paid...
Positive Reviews: This hotel is fantastic, the staff were helpful and friendly, its central location is ideal. The breakfast buffet had a vast choice, and despite the size of the hotel and the number of guests was anything but chaotic. The bed was really comfortable, and the twin room a decent size, and being on the 17th floor gave a good view of the city. The cherry on the top of the cake, so to speak, was the rooftop bar...amazing views and great atmosphere, if its like this in February then it will be even more so in summer. If you plan to go to Madrid, look no further than this hotel.

Negative Reviews: Nothing bad to say.
Positive Reviews: So impressive. Sky bar an original, impressive addition. Customer service wonderful and the rooms large and comfy. The view we had was amazing. Loved the breakfasts too!

Review Title: Would certainly recommend this hotel to anyone thinking about got to Madrid
Positive Reviews: The location was fantastic, breakfast had so much choice, rooms were spacious and vey modern, staff were very knowledgable

Review Title: Great Hotel with great location and enormous breakfast.
Negative Reviews: I liked everything.
Positive Reviews: The location of the hotel was great. The hotel was crowded but staff was very efficient in moving things along. I loved the automated elevator system - you have to scan your room key when going up to your room on a scanner in the lobby and it pops up your floor and tells you which elevator to take. The elevator comes immediately, you hop on and it stops on your floor. No buttons to press at all once you scan your key card. Everything is automatic. I was very impressed as I have not seen this before. Breakfast is enormous - including champagne!

Review Title: Del Riu Plaza España al cielo
Negative Reviews: Nothing at all.
Positive Reviews: Our fave hotel when in Madrid. Location, service and breakfast are superb. Rooms are big and super comfortable. The views are just to die for. Impossible to stay anywhere else after staying at the Riu Plaza España.
Room Type: Deluxe Family Twin Room (2 Adults + 1 Child)

Review Title: Strongly recommend this hotel. Great value for money! Nice atmosphere, great location and lovely staff
Positive Reviews: This hotel ticked all the boxes for us. It was amazing, probably one of the best hotels I’ve ever stayed in!! It had everything on its doorstep. The location was excellent, staff was really helpful and friendly, they couldn’t do enough for you. The breakfast was amazing with a choice of everything hot and cold that you could think of. The bar on the 27th floor was the best place to watch the sunset and see Madrid lit up at night. Alejandro was very attentive to us as a family when we would go up in the evening. Gabrielle at the information desk was so helpful too going through the map with us. The hotel room was amazing and a bottle of water was left in every day, its the little things that count.

Negative Reviews: Nothing to mention
Positive Reviews:
Wow!
Great hotel!!!
Perfect location - right in the city center.
Spacious, well equipped rooms.
Clean.
Great breakfast.
Nice, helpful staff.
I rarely give 10, but this is a real 10.
Already want to be back.

Negative Reviews: Nothing all was excellent.
Positive Reviews: Excellent Hotel. The room with the terrace was superb with a view over Plaza Espana. The room was big and spotlessly clean. The breakfast was amazing with choices to suit every diet. The hotel is centrally located being a short walk to the Palace with plenty of shops, restaurants and tapas bars close by. The staff are excellent with nothing too much trouble. A first class hotel.
Room Type: Deluxe Superior King Room with Terrace

Positive Reviews: Staff friendliness, exceptional service, 360 rooftop bar priority access, ideal comfortable rooms, wonderful views from every angle, amazing breakfast buffet included. I cannot wait to go back.

Review Title: Stunning hotel, great location and excellent facilities
Positive Reviews:
Great location, very central and excellent facilities and decoration in the hotel throughout. It felt very luxurious and the rooms were spacious and very clean and well equipped. we stayed for 2 nights for my birthday, the hotel went above and beyond to make our stay memorable and the service from all staff members was exceptional. The rooftop bar was excellent too and not expensive considering the views and location. We would definitely stay again  and recommend to our friends and family. 
The breakfast buffet had a large selection too and catered for many dietary needs and requirements (gluten free, lactose free etc.) This hotel is excellent!
Location, breakfast, and rooftop bar, cleanliness, friendliness of staffs

Really classy hotel with a perfect location. The building is quite imposing, as the hotel is masive. Our room was spacious, clean and had everything we needed. Breakfast was served in a large space and, even with a considerable number of guests, service was efficient and adapted to Covid times. There is also a rooftop terrace with an (obvious) pleasant view.
A definite return for Madrid.

Review Title: We had an excellent time in Madrid made better by staying at the hotel.
Negative Reviews: There wasn't much I could say i didn't like but the roof top pool was a little on the cold side (and this was in August).
Positive Reviews: Could not believe it when we stepped off the tube and there was the hotel. Excellent location at the bottom of the Gran Via and within easy reach of bars and restaurants. We were greeted at the door by a member of staff who welcomed us and showed us to reception. The staff on reception were friendly and helpful informing us of the times of breakfasts and where things were located in the hotel. We liked the way the lifts operated - it made us feel very safe. The roof top pool was a great way to relax after a day of sightseeing and the rooftop bar (I think it was called the secret garden) was an added bonus. The room was spacious, bathroom immaculate (and huge) and a fridge made the whole trip perfect for us! Breakfast was a different level - so much choice and food, and despite all of the warnings of how busy breakfast would be, we never waited long. Queues for the lifts were always managed by the staff and they did their upmost to keep you moving. We would not hesitate in recommending this hotel and would definitely stay here again.
Room Type: Deluxe Superior Twin Room (2 Adults + 1 Child)

Positive Reviews:
The staff on the reception is really polite and helpful, they tell you everything you need to know right when you arrive (like which floors you have access to and etc.). Service is great overall!
They offer a wide variety of food for breakfast and there's even some gluten free options. You don't have to fight for a table since there's someone who assigns them. Good quality and many options to chose from.
Very high level of security, the elevators can only be activated with your room card which prevents anyone else from getting up.
You have unlimited access to the 360 skybar, of course the drinks aren't free but that is expected. The view from the bar is amazing and the prices are reasonable.
The rooms are in great shape and have no problems at all.
The hotel is very clean in general, the staff is extremely polite and helpful, the food is great.
5/5 i would definitely stay here again.

Review Title: Hotel Riu Plaza de España will be my hotel of choice if I return to Madrid.
Positive Reviews: I felt very safe knowing the access to elevators was limited to those with keys to the rooms.  The quality of the food at daily breakfast and the variety of the food offered were extremely good as well as the staff who were very accommodating and professional. All around the staff was very friendly and professional, that is front desk, doormen, restaurants, etc.  Location was excellent, very easy to take taxis, Ubers, right next to trains and buses.  Great shopping stores all around and lots of restaurants and bars at walking distance.
great room, good views across the square, brilliant breakfast, sky bar was amazing, really friendly staff
Room Type: Superior Deluxe King Room with View

Negative Reviews: Nothing!
Positive Reviews: I loved everything about this hotel! The room was spacious, modern and very very clean. The staff were so helpful, the location was great and central to everything! So easy to just walk around. Rooftop bar was amazing and so was the complimentary breakfast. Would 100% return to Madrid for this hotel.

Excellent hotel. Efficient and friendly staff. Great breakfast with a wide variety of breads, cheeses, cold cuts of all kinds and even gluten free. Quiet and comfortable room.Good wifi Great location close to attractions, bars and restaurants.Gym enough.Famous Roof top bar

Great location...very friendly & helpful staff...room very comfortable & breakfast excellent. Fantastic view of city from sky bar on top floor. Very busy hotel but seems to run like clockwork Just across from the hotel a magnificent park (Parque del Oeste)for a walk/run with great views of the palace & city..loved the chandelier in the foyer!

Review Title: Fantastic modern hotel, great location in Madrid, great food, great service - we will be back!
Negative Reviews: We had an issue with the aircon in the first night - while it was fixed quickly once we spoke to someone, the instructions our how to keep your aircon on are not clear.  If you stay and have any issues, call housekeeping straight away and they will sort it out.  And if you need a carpark, you need to approach the hotel from the left hand side, and turn right at the hotel and then right again behind the hotel - you will see the carpark entrance to your left (most likely with a doorman standing next to it).  You simply take a ticket and then pay at the end of your stay.  Car parks are small - as is often the case in Europe so be aware.  And you may need concierge's help to get out on your last day - we did!
Positive Reviews: The modern and classy style of the building;  from check-in to check-out our stay was great!  We booked a room with our own terrace and the view was stunning.  Our room was large and had a small fridge, we could easily get ice for drinks (at no charge - but note, you need to go to the rooftop bar for this).  The breakfast room is enormous and you can easily socially distance.  The rooftop bar was great - note, lots of people go there on a Sunday, but great vibe and service.
Room Type: Deluxe Superior King Room with Terrace

Negative Reviews: Nothing
Positive Reviews: Everything!! The decor, the exceptional staff, the room size and standard. The rooftop bar! The quality of breakfast. The amazing location....simply superb.

Review Title: We had a very enjoyable stay.
Positive Reviews: Great location, easy to walk to main areas. Rooftop bar is a bonus as a guest. Breakfast was exceptional, wide range of food available, staff welcoming and friendly at breakfast, never had to queue considering the size of the property.  Room size was perfect for family of 4 with teenagers.

Review Title: Great stay. Definitely will be back!
Negative Reviews: Loved the property
Positive Reviews:
The rooftop bar was awesome! Great views of the city, great drinks and light fare. 
Rooms were nice. Staff was friendly and helpful. Easy to walk to places

Negative Reviews: Nothing
Positive Reviews: Most beautiful hotel I have stayed at. Great location on Gran Via and transport at your door. Pool is great to relax. Bar 360 is awesome and jewel of this great hotel. Great staff, breakfast with good choices. Room are very good and clean. I must return.

Review Title: Excellent hotel, friendly staff and a good location.
Negative Reviews: Nothing to say.
Positive Reviews: The location of the hotel was great. The hotel was crowded but staff was very efficient in moving things along. I loved the automated elevator system - you have to scan your room key when going up to your room on a scanner in the lobby and it pops up your floor and tells you which elevator to take. The elevator comes immediately, you hop on and it stops on your floor. No buttons to press at all once you scan your key card. Everything is automatic. I was very impressed as I have not seen this before. Breakfast is enormous - including champagne!

5 star location of the hotel, 5 star roof top bar on the 27th floor and efficient elevator system, amazing 5 star breakfast, clean and comfortable room with  excellent views on the city, everything well organized, excellent and polite staff at the entrance as well as in all hotel’s premises, all in all wonderful experience for us and our children

Negative Reviews: So far I like everything about this hotel.
Positive Reviews: Great hotel with a very fliendly and welcoming staff. Love the view, comfort and size of the rooms, delicious  breakfast and the gym. Every time I visit Madrid, this is my #1 choice hotel.

Negative Reviews: Air con didn’t work properly.
Positive Reviews:
Lots of helpful and attentive staff. 
Roof top bar with 360 degree views over Madrid.
Loads of breakfast options.
Very secure.
Located very centrally.
Huge room.

Negative Reviews: Nothing. Everything was great.
Positive Reviews: Everything! The location was brilliant, the facilities were excellent and the staff were so friendly. Loved the rooms, the breakfast and the access to the rooftop bar. Wouldn't hesitate to stay here again.

The room was very clean, the bed is good. I like everything. Service was good . Very good breakfast. I like the elevator, no waiting.
The rooftop bar and restaurant are so amazing. 
The view is breathtaking!! Best location!!!!

Beautiful and breathtaking views, nice design indoors, friendly staff, but still it feels like a cheap hotel with not so cheap room fares. Breakfast options are huge, from cold cuts, churros, freshly made smoothies, eggs, sausages... you really have to take a full buffet tour to decide what you're gonna take, which that's something to highlight of a hotel, as that gives way more than enough options for everyone's tastes and needs. Althought food quality wasn't the best I've seen by far. Having said that, hotel's staff really make up for all the other flaws. From outstanding and friendly bellmans, to a very nice receptionist who made sure I got a room with beautiful views, and super friendly breakfast waiters. I'd also like to highlight the covid protocols, which are very strict but still offer good guest experience, as you still get ammenities such as glasses, tea/coffee facilities, and a complimentary water bottle in your room (all those have disappeared since the pandemic in most hotels).

Review Title: Fantastic location for first time explorers of Madrid.
Negative Reviews: Couldn’t fault it in any way.
Positive Reviews: Amazing location, excellent breakfast, friendly staff, very clean, lovely pool - always loungers free, huge terrace, fabulous roof top bar with priority access for hotel guests.
Room Type: Superior Deluxe King Room with View

Review Title: Beautiful rooftop bar, clean quiet rooms and perfect location
Positive Reviews: The Riu had everything we could as for, and more.  Great room, amazing staff, delicious breakfast, ideal location and an exceptional rooftop bar with panoramic views!!
Room Type: Deluxe Superior King Room with Terrace

Review Title: Beautiful, romantic stay in a fabulous city
Negative Reviews: Nothing it couldn't be any better
Positive Reviews: The hotel was spectacular. From entering with the help of the concierge to the day we left the staff we all fabulous.   Beautiful rooftop bar with 360 degrees views of Madrid, placed in a great location in the Gran Via, very clean modern rooms with fridge, kettle, safe etc. Breakfast buffet was amazing. This should be a five star hotel. Will certainly stay again.

Negative Reviews: Couldn’t say one thing.
Positive Reviews: The rooms are clean, newest, spacious and great views. Staff were excellent, caring and great social skills. We were also given an unexpected upgrade and thank you very much. Our location could not of been any better. The breakfasts were to die for, great choices and quality. We would definitely recommend this accommodation to our friends and family. Leaving Madrid on a very positive note. Thanks to all.

Review Title: Fabulous stay. Would come back in a heartbeat.
Negative Reviews: There’s nothing not to like.
Positive Reviews: This hotel has everything you need. Gabriel checked us in and he was the nicest most friendly person. Check in was a breeze. Our room was incredible with a fantastic view. The roof top bar is something else. Great music, the staff were brilliant, the ambience was superb. The 360 views are amazing.  Breakfast has something for everyone and even had a separate section for gluten free which was perfect for me. Would highly recommend. The metro station is right outside which is east and cheap to use. And for those who like shopping, there’s a huge Zara right next door.

Review Title: Classy, great location, clean, courteous staff and the breakfast is amazing
Negative Reviews: How busy it was but that’s the time of year I guess. Can’t really complain.
Positive Reviews:
The breakfast 
The roof top bar
The cleanliness 
Location
Staff

Review Title: Absolutely fantastic & much more than we anticipated!
Negative Reviews: Nothing
Positive Reviews: Absolutely superb hotel our room was very comfortable, well equipped & so so clean. The location couldn’t have been better. We needed parking & this hotel even had that! Rooftop bar well worth a visit, the staff were amazing, the breakfast fantastic…. There’s a theme here!!! Would definitely recommend.

Negative Reviews: Nothing
Positive Reviews: Fabulous location. Great rooms. Amazing breakfast. Friendly staff and stunning roof top bar!

Negative Reviews: Some minor things that are not worth mentioning.
Positive Reviews:
We had an absolutely wonderful time over Christmas at this hotel! Madrid is magical on Dec 24 & 25, and this hotel added to the magic. 

It's got the best position in town on Plaza España.

Super-professional and friendly personnel. You can tell the business is managed extremely well.

Comfortable room, quiet as I had requested, we slept well. 

Excellent breakfast buffet. The rooftop bar has amazing views. 

Last but not least, the gym is very good to be a hotel gym + opened 24/7.

We'll book here for our next Madrid visit.

Negative Reviews: Nothing
Positive Reviews:
Fantastic location , very clean , lovely staff and breakfast .  The roof top bar was beautiful 
Thank you we had a great stay would definitely come back and recommend

Negative Reviews: Nothing
Positive Reviews:
Location, services was perfect 
Hotel was extremely clean 
Rooftop bar was great
Breakfast was nice

Review Title: Excellent Hotel in a great location
Negative Reviews: Only issue was  one that most hotels seem to have . My wife always brings her own hairdryer and there wasn't a plug close to the mirror for her to use
Positive Reviews: The Hotel is centrally located , close to the bars and restaurants , a short walk to the Royal Palace , the Hotel was excellent , the shower was a good size and powerful and the bathroom was well equipped and to a high standard, the breakfast was excellent with a great choice of fresh ingredients , there is a roof top balcony where you can have a drink or some food with 360 degrees  views of the city , the staff were helpful on the few occasions when we had to talk to them , we had a room on the 23rd floor which was great for city views , if we are ever back in Madrid we would certainly book this hotel again

Review Title: Awesome room, location, bed and Roof Top bar.
Negative Reviews: everything was great
Positive Reviews: Wonderful hotel and room.  We got upgraded for our stay which was the last night of a 3 week Europe holiday. That was a pleasant surprise.  I chose the hotel as it had a pool and wanted to relax on the last day by the pool before our long flight and we weren't disapointed.  The pool is small and very cold but perfect for our last day to relax on a pool lounger with a few drinks. The hotel is super busy which came as a bit of a surprise although did not deter from the service and the breakfast room is massive.  The largest breakfast room I have seen by a longshot. The breakfast was delicious and plentiful and our  room was large and comfortable.  Great bathroom and view overlooking the park across the road.  Good location for our last night dinner and the Roof top bar is amazing.  A must if you are staying here.  Even if you are not you have to go here just for 1 drink and the view.

Everything was great! The location is perfect for a trip in Madrid, very close to a lot of visiting points, the restaurant and the sky bar are at the 26th and 27th floor, with a breathing view!!! The rooms are clean, they have an excellent elevator, very friendly staff and a lobby bar where you can have a snack or drink cocktails.
The breakfast is very good, lots of choices  for every taste.
Room Type: Deluxe Superior King Room with Terrace

Review Title: Luxury Hotel experience at a reasonable price
Negative Reviews: Nothing
Positive Reviews: Clean modern central location fantastic staff personal service and local advice Sky bar amazing rooms spotless restaurant brilliant highly recommend

Breakfast is amazing.
Room and shower were spacious and clean.
Location is PERFECT.
The staff was courteous and always in a great mood.

Negative Reviews: I would have enjoyed to have access to a sauna the months that the pool is not open!
Positive Reviews:
The location is perfect! The metro station is in front of the hotel entrance, the connection with busses is excellent and some of the main attractions can be reached on foot as well.
The hotel is super nice, the triple room was comfortable and spacious (could easily accommodate 4 people).
The view from the hotel was marvellous and the easy access to the Sky bar one of the biggest pros. The sky bar is a must do in Madrid! Incredible view and a balcony to take the most memorable picture.
Highlight of the hotel is undoubtedly the amazing breakfast! A variety of Spanish and international flavours, will leave you more than satisfied!
The staff nice and polite! The service very good and efficient.
The room and the hotel overall very clean and tidy.
Overall a great hotel! Highly recommended!

Negative Reviews: Not applicable
Positive Reviews: The Riu Plaza España is a fantastic hotel, with great friendly and attentive employees.  The location is great, breakfast great, incredibly clean.  The hotel was perfect!

Review Title: Fantastic hotel with rooftop bar, comfy rooms & great service!
Negative Reviews: N/a
Positive Reviews:
Sky-High Elegance in Madrid!

Fantastic hotel with exceptional facilities, warm staff, and a rooftop bar with breathtaking views! Room with city view was out of this world, and the bed was so comfortable. Delicious breakfast too!

Shoutout to Isabella at the customer service desk - her recommendations were spot on!

Review Title: I would choose RiU Plaza Espana over most other hotels
Negative Reviews: Nothing negative to say. This hotel is perfectly tuned, like a swiss watch.
Positive Reviews:
Perfect location, walking distance to everything you would want to visit in Madrid. Breakfast was excellent and i really appreciated the staff in the restaurant, the food, and general organisation of the breakfast buffet. 
All the staff in the lobby was very polite and helpful from the doorman to the reception clerks. 
Rooms are quiet, elevators are plenty and fast, and the view from the rooftop is amazing.

Location was great, the hotel is clean and well staffed. Breakfast was excellent with myriad choices and nice fresh orange juice. The bar on the top floor was always rocking with an amazing que to enter if one was not a hotel guest. Hotel guests got in immediately. Drinks were good, views were fabulous. With the large bar in top, our room on the fourth floor was very quiet even though it was over the busy street and plaza below. 
This is a large and busy hotel. Well run..just not out style, although I’d likely stay there again. We had an issue with the A/C which was fixed the next day and also the hand shower needed tightening, which was also fixed after we called. The service on both these was good. Laundry wasn’t picked up, so my pants didn’t get cleaned. They’ll have to wait Not a huge deal. 
Friendly staff.

Review Title: Pure comfort and made to feel special.
Negative Reviews: Nothing. thank you and well done :)
Positive Reviews: We had a lovely room with a view of the plaza, great location, the staff were helpful, friendly & made us feel special. The bed was incredible and we loved our stay. We had no problems ever getting space in the pool despite the size of the hotel, great breakfast and good gym as well. We would definitely stay again.

Negative Reviews: The pool was closed one evening without warning for an event , I understand that the event was planned but we should have been told in advance .
Positive Reviews:
It is a beautiful hotel, clean, with friendly staff. Comfy beds and spacious rooms
The breakfast buffet was superb. Great value for money . Very quiet and great location.

Review Title: Stag weekend for Mad Cool festival
Positive Reviews:
Stylish, great location right next to metro stop.
comfortable, quiet room on inside of building, no view but sleep more important! 
Staff alert and organised but not in your face.
Great breakfast, superb organisation, plenty of choice.
Sky Bar was awesome!

Negative Reviews: Nothing. To stay longer!!
Positive Reviews: The service was outstanding. Our room was perfect with an amazing view. We loved it! It was clean and spacious. The breakfast was amazing and everyone was wonderful and ready to help.

Negative Reviews: Ocassionally the heating went loud then got back silent but this did not affect its functionality.
Positive Reviews:
Very central location, walking distance to most of major sights. 
Very helpful staff, clean, spacious and well equipped rooms.
Wide selection of tasty breakfast.

Review Title: An excellent hotel and will definitely return!
Positive Reviews: Breakfast was def 5star! It was very organised with no queuing! Amazing choice and plenty stations for buffet. Coffee machines were very easy to work. The staff were all very polite and helpful. The concierge staff were very pleasant and helpful. The hotel is extremely central with easy access to metro stations. The room was amazing and was more like a suite. We had an amazing view over Madrid. The room was cleaned every morning to a very good standard. The 360degrees rooftop bar was spectacular! It was lovely to finish off the evening with a drink up there with magnificent views!

Negative Reviews: Nothing!
Positive Reviews: Fantastic hotel. Amazing facilities, very welcoming staff. The views from the sky bar are breathtaking. Booked a room with a city view and was out of this world! The bed was so comfortable and a wonderful breakfast was provided. Will definitely book again when in Madrid.
Room Type: Superior Deluxe King Room with View

Review Title: For a leisure traveler to Madrid, Rui Plaza Espana is the very best value.
Negative Reviews: Cannot think of anything I didn’t like.
Positive Reviews: The staff treats the guests exceptionally well.  The rooftop bar is the best rooftop of any place I have ever been.  Hotel guests get priority access to it while the public has to wait in line. very clean and well-organized all around. And the breakfast buffet is excellent. Great location, too.

Review Title: New hotel destination for a memorable stay in Madrid
Negative Reviews: Nothing, it was great!
Positive Reviews: We were mesmerised by this hotel from the second we stepped in. The staff was well-trained, attentive and prompt, so it was immediately clear that we were there to just enjoy the stay. We loved the view of Plaza de España, and the issue of AC and shower hose were fixed promptly. The breakfast buffet was top-notch, and the terrace was the best thing there. I was looking forward to checking this hotel, having been to Madrid many times before, and I was really impressed. Will be booking my next stay there. Well done!

Negative Reviews: I had no bathtub.
Positive Reviews: The room size, the facilities and the views from the skybar. Breakfast was another highlight. The staff were all very friendly and helpful too.

Negative Reviews: I got nothing but good things to say!
Positive Reviews: My fiancé and I travelled to Barcelona, Ibiza, València, and finally Madrid. This was our favorite hotel for many reasons. The location was perfect, the air conditioning worked great, the staff was so friendly and helpful, and the breakfast was top notch. I would 100% stay here again and would reccomend to anyone coming to Madrid.

Negative Reviews: Nothing not to like, in truth.
Positive Reviews:
Comfortable room, elegant lobby
Lovely breakfast.
Helpful and friendly and efficient staff.
Location very convenient...
Good value.
Very efficient security with the elevator system.
Great view from rooftop bar.
The history of the hotel.
A beautiful story that ended so we'll.

Review Title: Lovely hotel but needs a few small improvements
Negative Reviews: Bathroom didn't seem sound proof which would be off putting if I was sharing with someone. Poor quality gluten free bread at breakfast. The hotel was trying to look like 5 star quality without being quite there.
Positive Reviews: Lovely spacious room with a view over the Plaza España. Comfortable bed with lots of storage space, tea and coffee, good hairdryer and iron and ironing board. Good quality toiletries and towels. Lovely spacious bathroom with walk in shower. Good selection breakfast. Staff very friendly and helpful with doormen.

Negative Reviews:
- very loud in breakfast room
- very small pool at terrace 
- sofa bed in family room not comfortable
Positive Reviews:
- Breakfast with very good options
- Nice and friendly staff
- top location for exploring Madrid
- spacious room

Review Title: This hotel served as our base in Madrid. It’s location. security and comfort helped us to have a wonderful time in beaut
Negative Reviews: Our visit was during the month of April. Weather ranged between cold rainy days and hot humid days. The hotel has every room with heater system and no other option. We had to open the window during most nights. The staff explained they could do nothing to improve the situation.
Positive Reviews: The hotel has an excellent location. It is walking distance to numerous restaurants and shops. Close to the Plaza Mayor and many historic sites. The rooms are spacious and have confortable beds, closets and bathrooms. Their buffet breakfast is awesome!!!! The staff is friendly and showed interest in assisting us at all times. I’m general, this is a very good place to stay during your visit to beautiful Madrid.

Review Title: Great facilities, few rude staff members, room availability should be clearly mentioned at booking.
Negative Reviews: We booked a king-size deluxe room for our entire stay but were given a double-twin room for the first night. The reception staff was rude and said that the entire hotel was booked and just 2 rooms are left - one double-twin bed room and 1 king-size bed room meant for handicapped individuals. It was a pain to talk with that person. We had to ask for the manager. The manager told us that they would move us to the better king-size bed room the next day. All this experience left a very bad-taste for us.
Positive Reviews:
Few staff members were very nice. The second room given to us (after request for 2nd night) was very good.
The roof-top bar is great with amazing city views and the breakfast is too good.

Negative Reviews: Dining room, too big , gave the impression of being in a staff canteen
Positive Reviews: Having stayed in many 4star hotels across Madrid, at last,some thought  has been put in to where power sockets are located ,and with good lighting within the rooms.The room we had booked was spacious with a great view of the Plaza, the sound proofing from the outside was excellent,so no sleepless nights.Staff all very professional,polite, and helpful, breakfast good quality.
Room Type: Deluxe Superior King Room with Terrace

Review Title: Excellent hotel at central locationn very spacious and clean room, amazing view from the window.
Negative Reviews:
- The night light in the bathroom had too sensitive motion detector sensor. It was reacting to every movement in the room, including flipping from side to side in bed.
- The wardrobe didn't have any shelves, only a valet rod, though a long one.
- During the breakfast hours there was a traffic jam at the elevators, which is not surprising, the building has 27 floors.
Positive Reviews:
Excellent hotel at very central location. Nice and friendly stuff. Very spacious, well equipped and clean room. Huge bed with good enough mattresses. Amazing view from the window, straight to the Plaza de España. Generous and very tasty breakfast. 
Overall we've had an amazing vacation and would definitely come back to this hotel.

Review Title: Wonderful hotel, would definitly stay there again.
Negative Reviews:
There are a couple of lounges for drinks and snack but we were told there wasn't a restaurant, so we had to walk around for a bit to find a place for dinner. We were a bit tired and really didn't want to go searching for a place to eat, and Air Europa never put our bags on our flight from Malaga so walking around in dingy clothes wasn't fun.

The only other thing that bothered me was the light in the bathroom that turns on automatically when you walk in, it turns off after a short time and you have to make a movement or wave hour hand around for it to come back on. While trying to brush my teeth the light had to be re-triggered multiple times. Maybe I was doing something wrong?  

I still rate the hotel as exceptional.
Positive Reviews: We liked almost everything about this hotel, it's a beautiful place with wonderful staff, a clean spacious room and and modern amenities. It was about 30 minutes from the airport by taxi which cost a fixed price of 30 euros.  The buffet breakfast was the best breakfast we've had in many years. We would definitely stay at this location again.

Negative Reviews: The hotel is really really big and busy. This was only an issue at breakfast - the restaurant is large, noisy and gets quite crowded. The room was well soundproofed but there was constant noise from the ventilation system. Not too loud but still unpleasant at night.
Positive Reviews: Clean large room, excellent hotel facilities and nice new interior. Very nice view from the higher floors. The hotel is very well managed and staffed, there is a lot of staff everywhere, always helpful and efficient. Checking, checkout were really smooth. Good choice at breakfast. Overall, I can recommend the hotel, especially if you don't mind occasional crowds.

Negative Reviews:
There are no actual complains, but it is worth to mention that we struggled to turn the heating on at the begining, but staff was very helpful.
Connecting to th WiFi was also a nightmare at the begginiging until we realised we needed to change the password that we were provided with.
In terms of decoration, it was really simple. 
The fridge was empty (not even water for an hotel that category) , although it they provided coffee and tea with a kettle in the room (as described), which kind of compensates a bit. 
Finally, we found the TV satelite channels awful!
Positive Reviews:
I spend the weekend with my partner for our anniversary. The staff was friendly and helpful, our room was quiet, very big, and the bed was super sized and comfy! It met our expectations...but our favourite part was the views from our room. Speechless! 
In addition, breakfast was delicious and very complete. We enjoyed all the amenities, including 360° sky bar and restaurants. It was a great and pleasant experience.
Room Type: Deluxe Superior King Room with Terrace

Negative Reviews: I was hoping that the hotel had a bigger lobby to relax in and more common areas. The swimming pool was also a bit smaller than I thought.
Positive Reviews:
I was completely blown away by the views I had from my room , the swimming pool and the rooftop bar.
The room was clean and big enough to accommodate all of us, the beds were decent sized and comfortable and the bathroom was modern and clean just the way I like.
Staff was friendly and caring the entire time and made every effort to cater for our requests at all times. I loved the breakfast buffet, the options variety was endless and the food was delicious. Location is not a problem either, quite central close to the main attractions and the action of the city and in case need to go farther away you have the stairs to the Plaza de España metro station literally next to the hotel entrance. The rooftop bar is a must see, the views from up there are splendid and has a great vibe.

Review Title: Excellent hotel.  I would tell anyone visiting Madrid to stay here.
Negative Reviews: Pool was crowded.
Positive Reviews: Great location.  Friendly staff.  Amazing rooftop view.  Comfortable room.  Breakfast was pretty good.  Elevators are impressive and ahead of our time.  Great overall value!

Review Title: An excellent location for a stay in Madrid.
Negative Reviews: The “heated” pool was VERY cold and VERY small. The elevator system is interesting but not as effective as it could have been. Having to pay extra to park isn’t terrible — but parking was absurdly expensive.
Positive Reviews: Bright, airy room with a gorgeous view of the Plaza España. Wonderful shower. Extensive breakfast buffet. The views from the rooftop bar and observation deck are spectacular. Extremely friendly doormen and lobby staff.

Negative Reviews: Pool and gym were smaller than expected.
Positive Reviews:
Location was fabulous, hotel was elegant and welcoming, bathroom and room service.... what more could you want. 
The 360 bar was wonderful to visit and guests are given priority which was nice.

Review Title: One of the best places to stay in Madrid
Negative Reviews: Takes a while to get used to the elevator system.
Positive Reviews:
Great Breakfast
Large Room with terrace and a view
Helpful personnel
Fantastic Madrid view from the rooftop bar
Central location

Review Title: If you want to visit Madrid the Rui Plaza España will not disappoint. Fantastic in every way.
Negative Reviews: Nothing apart from the untypical Spanish weather. This hotel was different class.
Positive Reviews: Everything was fantastic at this hotel. Location, room, staff, breakfast and the out of this world rooftop bar.
Room Type: Deluxe Superior King Room with Terrace

Review Title: The drilling/building work woke us up early!!! After a night of drinking cocktails in the sky bar. This was a real s
Negative Reviews: Noise/building work early in the morning.
Positive Reviews:
Sky bar
Friendly staff
Large room. 
Good breakfast 
Good location- next door to large Zara!

Negative Reviews:
Pool area were over crowded 
The time you check out you dont belong to the hotel any more, I checked out and I asked the receptionist if I can access the sky bar for a while because its still early for my flight, she told me no sorry you have to go out and access from the sky bar reception from the back oh the hotel. Most of the good hotels they allow you to use the hotel facilities in the day of checking out for a while
Positive Reviews:
Room was good and organized 
Breakfast was good
Location is great 
View from the skybar is the best in Madrid
Staff in the reception were not really welcoming they were just no expression faces

Negative Reviews: The pool was very small and was hard to get a spot near it unless you were there dead on 11. The other tables for drinking etc didn't have anything to shade you either unless you dragged them under the bar area. However, for the time we spent there it didn't impact our holiday and would still stay there again
Positive Reviews: Brilliant location, just short walk to Palace and right by a metro station. Staff were friendly and helpful. Stunning views from rooftop bar. Rooms were spacious and clean - excellent shower too. Breakfast was incredible, spoilt for choice and accommodated vegetarian, vegan and gluten free. Already booked for next year.

Review Title: Quality accommodation at a very reasonable price.
Negative Reviews: Breakfast self-serve was very spread out and it was a little challenging to find some things.
Positive Reviews: Location was very convenient - close to a metro station, to the hop-on hop-off bus stop, to plenty of restaurants and shops; the room had a small desk and chair off the bedroom so could sit comfortably and use wifi; room also had tea/coffee making facilities and being on the 23rd floor, a great view. Staff were extra helpful, good security system for accessing correct floor.

Review Title: I would definitely stay here again and recommend to friends who are visiting Madrid.
Negative Reviews: The pool bar doesn't stay open all day and the bar prices are a little bit pricey if you are on a budget (which we weren't, we just drink alot). :)
Positive Reviews: Location, facilities and high standards of staff and service were superb. The cleanliness and attention to detail was excellent with friendly professional staff. The journey from the airport was straight forward with one change on the metro and the hotel is right outside the metro stop. The pool was great with enough sun loungers and the gym had all the equipment you needed for a good workout. This is one of the best hotels I have stayed in and I have travelled a lot. A worthy mention is the breakfast selection and quality of food on offer, superb, caters for all tastes and diets. Big thumbs up for this hotel.

Review Title: Loved the room and the location and the hotel….if back to Madrid again would definately stay here
Negative Reviews: It’s a big hotel so breakfast is very busy and loud. The hotel runs it really well and the choices and food were amazing but it was not a chilled way to start the morning
Positive Reviews: Great location, super friendly and informative staff, great facilities and breakfast and the roof top bar and pool were amazing. We had a junior suite and the room and terrace were immense in size and more then worth the money.

Negative Reviews: Breakfast time window was too tight, final time was 8.30am which was too early for holidays!
Positive Reviews:
Great location at the top of gran via,  very close to all major sites. The rooftop bar is amazing with great food and drinks, and the staff were very friendly and welcoming. 

The room was large and airy and the bed was huge and very comfortable! 

The covid measures were very reassuring,  with sanitizer stations and time limits by the pool to avoid crowding. 

While the breakfast service window was too small, and breakfast itself was gorgeous and very varied !

Negative Reviews: The staff in general was helpful and welcoming. Except some of the security at night as well as the employees working in the rooftop terrace. They did not seem in sync with the protocols they had. As well as some were a little unkind.
Positive Reviews: Really liked the breakfast and facilities. The room was perfect with a beautiful view as well as the location of the hotel. We got exactly what we had booked. The room was tidied up excellent, what was provided in the rooms were great. In general the staff were pleasant and very helpful.

Negative Reviews: The only one bad point about this hotel is that there isn’t a card system to enter the hotel overnight. Every hotel I have stayed in you just present your card to a sensor and it opens the doors, with Rui you need to knock on the door or ring the doorbell to attract the security member off staffs attention who will open the door for you. It feels a little like coming home from a night out when staying at your parents 😂
Positive Reviews: Amazing location right opposite plaza de espana. Hotel staff were very friendly and personable. Very happy with the room size, much bigger then I expected and had amazing views over the plaza. House keeping were exceptional, the room felt brand new every single day. I ordered 2 burgers off the room service menu and was incredibly impressed, delicious burgers and chips and provided plenty of condiments, cutlery napkins. Rooftop top bar does get very busy during the evening but that’s only because it is very good, went there during the afternoon once and had a lovely chat with one of the staff there who was incredibly accommodating with of us. All in all an excellent hotel and will be going again in the future

Negative Reviews:
No one at Guest Services desk everytime we went.
 
Had to queue at Front Desk and that was really busy!

Concierge was overwhelmed by cases. More front of house staff needed.
Positive Reviews: Room, location, breakfast and bar staff - great service.

Negative Reviews: There were a convention or something like that in the hotel, so when I arrived, I found a bunch of people in the reception, a bit overwhelming. Different staff was assigned to us and it worked, but it was not comfortable.
Positive Reviews: Good location. The room was larger than the standard in Spain. Great breakfast. The staff is kind and polite.

Negative Reviews: Some of the staff were a bit unfriendly, the exception were the bell boys & reception who were pleasant & helpful, others could be a bit more welcoming.
Positive Reviews:
Excellent location, very spacious, clean & comfortable room on the 17th floor with a great view over the plaza. 
We only ate breakfast which was run extremely efficiently by very hard working staff. No waiting for a table or queues at the food stations. Great selection of food. 
Rooftop bar was impressive but unfortunately too cold during our stay.
Room Type: Superior Deluxe King Room with View

Review Title: A must-stay in Madrid, with a world-class 360 degree rooftop bar that will make you feel like a million dollars!
Negative Reviews: If there is one single thing I would change about the hotel, it’s the pool size. It is really small for the amount of guests the hotel can accomodate. However, the pool being on the 21st floor, the view from up there is also amazing.
Positive Reviews: The location is unbeatable, as it’s right at the start of La Gran Via avenue and a metro station is just outside the hotel. The hotel is beautiful everywhere, modern and classy. The hotel bars are gorgeous, and have great tapas, and the 360 Rooftop bar on the 27th floor must be one of the coolest in the world, with what I would argue is the best view in Madrid. Hotel guests have free entry (and I would say priority access) to this bar, whereas non guests have to pay a fee just to get in. The rooms are nice and have good storage space. The shower is perfect, as it’s spacious and safe (not slippery at all). When the hotel is at full capacity, breakfast will be crowded but the staff and how they handle everything is so organized that it works perfectly with little to no waiting time and permanent stock of pastries, fruits, hams, cheeses, meats, eggs, etc. The gym not only has cardio equipment but also dumbbells, benches and a multi-exercise strength training machine. Overall, this hotel is fantastic!

Review Title: Excellent hotel in excellent location with excellent staff - would highly recommend.
Negative Reviews:
Main 360 roof bar was closed for renovations, but ok roof bar on 21st floor with similar, but not as good views.
The bathroom was a little cramped - I'm being picky now.
Could have done with a few more USB chargers in the room, saves messing with plugs and adaptors etc.
Renovation scaffolding out front makes it look like a bit of a building site
Positive Reviews:
Location Excellent, right beside Metro and Plaza Espana (although its still not fully complete from recent renovations)
Breakfast Excellent
Staff Excellent
Room was big with plenty of space and nice views - overall very good.
Great COVID protocol and facilities.

Review Title: Excellent location, superb breakfast, gorgeous terrace view
Negative Reviews: My room is a little bit small and the furniture is simple. The half-door of the shower makes me worrying about splash water to the bathroom, but this may be the standard of many hotel in Spain. My room doesn't face the front so it doesn't provide me a very nice view but on the other hand it is very quite without any street noise.
Positive Reviews: The hotel is centrally located with walking distance to many attractions. Metro is only 10 meters away from the hotel door. The breakfast is superb with many selections of juices, fresh fruits, eggs, cheeses, meats, fishes, and various desserts, in a spacious dinning area. The staff is polite, nice, and always ready to help. Room and bed are cleaning. The view from the roof top terrace bar is gorgeous.

Review Title: We will definitely stay there again should we happen to come to Madrid in the future.
Negative Reviews:
Temperature regulation in the shower on the upper floors is NOT consistent.  It often went from hot to cold to hot again in a matter of seconds.

This was not a problem on the 6th floor when we had rooms provided by our tour company.
Positive Reviews:
Breakfast was bountiful, efficient and of good quality.  We were amazed at how many people they could handle.  

The Superior rooms (with a king bed) are well worth the extra cost.  Our first was on the 16th floor and this most recent one was on the 18th floor with a great view of the city, the plaza and the park.

We had a drink on the 27th floor our last night there and thoroughly enjoyed the sunshine, the view and the staff.

Review Title: perfect location, beautiful rooftop, very good breakfast
Negative Reviews:
I didn’t like that both persons who are staying in the room have to sign a form 
the trip to Madrid was a gift from me to my boyfriend for his birthday
and I didn’t like that the hotel reception called both of us to sign a sheet when checking in
with the amount on it, revealing how much was paid for this room
Positive Reviews: location, staff, breakfast, room, rooftop

Negative Reviews: The pool was a little small and you have to be there at 945 to get a bed.
Positive Reviews: Amazing hotel and exceptional service. Gabriel who greeted us at reception was really friendly and helpful and gave us an amazing room. He remembered our names and that it was our anniversary. We had champagne and chocolates delivered to our beautiful room with an amazing view. The rooftop was exceptional. The breakfast buffet had everything you needed and more.

Review Title: High class hotel with exceptionally helpful and friendly staff and good breakfast in great location
Negative Reviews:
No robes in the bedrooms 
Please put bathrobes in the rooms !!
I really felt this let down the hotel being as it is a hotel of high standards, and this was definitely lacking 🙁
Positive Reviews:
Location 
Staff
Service
Breakfast
Rooms
Cleanliness
Room Type: Deluxe Superior King Room with Terrace

Negative Reviews:
Paid for an upgraded room but had a smaller room than friends who hadn’t upgraded. 
Pool was a little small and sun beds filled up very quickly
Positive Reviews:
Great location
Friendly staff
Very clean
Great breakfast
Great roof top terrace 
Common areas were done to a very high spec 
Pool saved us in the heat!

Negative Reviews: only "issue" but I think it's more personal is that the bed shets are not the best!, too mainstream and not hight quality as you can think of such an awesome place
Positive Reviews:
Great place, awesome location the staff exceptional the rooms are biiigg, pool good for a city center hotel, I don't have children's but I think it's suitable for them, I am a 2 traveler and for couples I believe its the best hotel of you are coming to Madrid, the price wort it..


PD: The breakfast..❤️

Negative Reviews: The size of the sunterrace and the pool was quite smaller than I expected but it was nice by the way.
Positive Reviews:
The whole atmosphere was fabolous. The size and the the design of the room was absolutely perfect, just like the location.
The breakfast was the Best which I have ever experienced.
Very polite and helpful staff.

Review Title: Madrid is a great city break stay and a good stay at the Rui.
Negative Reviews: As above the window feature between bathroom/bedroom wasn't a practical idea
Positive Reviews:
breakfast was good for vegetarian - plenty of fruit, breads, cereal, nut seeds and soya milk.  No hot options for veggies
Location was very good and staff really helpful at the front desk for questions.  We also went to a great flemenco show nearby and found a close by vegan restaurant (Vega) which was really good. The Palace was really close too and well worth seeing. We had a double terrace room which was a good size, however we weren't keen on the frosted window and door separating the bathroom/bedroom as it meant the bedroom was lit up every time one used the toilet in the night.   There was however a very useful bathroom light that had an auto sensor so it came on when you approached, but of course it meant the bedroom was lit up for a bit too long in there middle of the night.  Otherwise good room and great stay.  We would use the Rui again but I would be careful to make sure the bathroom didn't have a window.....

Review Title: A very good hotel at a great location.
Negative Reviews: The restaurant (for dinner) was pricey and the food very average. The parking charged me for 2 days ($32) for a stay of less than 24 hours!
Positive Reviews: Excellent location, parking available, great staff, nice and comfortable room with working air conditioning, great breakfast.

Negative Reviews: Although we booked our room with 4 months in advance and precisely required a king bed, we received 2 twin beds..we had to spend one night in a twin bed room then changed the next morning to another one with a matrimonial bed. We would have of course preferred to avoid this precisely that it was my birthday.

Review Title: Very nice hotel, but be aware of the construction in Plaza España
Negative Reviews: There was no air conditioning, and our room had southwest exposure and became very warm in the afternoon. We could open the windows, but there's a massive construction project in Plaza España. Jack hammer noise from 8 am to 8 pm. Also the motion sensor light in the bathroom was very annoying, set much too short (about 8 seconds). I asked them to adjust it, which they did, but it still popped on and off repeatedly for even short visits to the bathroom. I'd also appreciate it if they reduced the hot water temperature, they could save money and conserve energy, no one needs it that hot.
Positive Reviews: Very comfortable bed, large room with nice view, great breakfast buffet. Great staff. And the room was quiet, except for the construction noise outside.

Review Title: Wonderful, clean and classy hotel and I will be back!
Negative Reviews: The only con was we were provided with only one key card and it is needed to access the elevator. The one key card is also needed to keep the lights on in the room so if you stay behind while your party leaves to roam Madrid or the rest of the hotel you will be sitting in the dark. However, I understand the technology as it is to be more energy efficient.

Review Title: Great choice for a Madrid break - would recommend
Negative Reviews: The beds could definitely have been better given the standard of everything else. Our room was not cleaned for 2 days over the weekend during a 6 night stay - not sure why. Lots of hanging space but no drawers for clothes. Lift system was a bit frustrating and waiting times longer than expected in some cases.
Positive Reviews: Buffet breakfast was great, all tastes catered for. Although busy, staff were friendly, efficient, polite and queues moved quickly. The location was ideal for all aspects of central Madrid. All forms of transport were easily accessible and walking was easy. This is the heart of the theatre and shopping district so go with empty suitcases! Pool on roof was not large but adequate. It got very busy as expected in the afternoon but there are additional sunbathing areas and enough space. Hotel bar prices were reasonable, focused in drinks only. Outside of breakfast menu options are limited but you are surrounded by choice outside. Roof views were amazing and you have access to the 26th floor bar which is chargeable for non-residents. I would recommend this hotel.
