Review Title: excellent price, excellent venue, apart from a few minor snags no issues at all
Negative Reviews:
it took 4 people to book us into 4 rooms of 2, all the details where in front of them but they insisted on us paying for the rooms separately even though we booked them all under one booking, it took a good 15 minutes to explain and they still tried their hardest to make it more complicated.

The life guard by the pool was proper grumpy as well
Positive Reviews: Great location to bars and restaurants, as well as place to go sightseeing. Hotel clean and looked after, sky bar was fantastic and the pool area was certainly large enough for everyone to chill out around.

Negative Reviews: Nithing really. Being picky, milk in the room would have been good rather than creamer
Positive Reviews: Breakfast was amazing and the size of the room was very spacious. Location was very central. We would definitely recommend staying here and would come back if we return to Madrid.

Negative Reviews: The Pool is not worth mentioning, way too small for the size of the hotel.
Positive Reviews: Great central location near metro. Clean, new rooms with everything you need. Biggest breakfast buffet we've ever seen. Sky bar with great view.

Negative Reviews: paid for deluxe king room with extra large bed and was gave a standard twin room, receptionist said they were fully booked so wouldn’t change it and no offer of any reimbursement
Positive Reviews: location, cleanliness, breakfast, roof bar

Negative Reviews: Would have loved a bath as well as the shower
Positive Reviews: Loved the location, rooftop bar & restaurant. Rooms were spacious, clean and comfortable
Room Type: Deluxe Superior King Room with Terrace

Negative Reviews: My only suggestion is that the bedding (sheets) should be upgraded.
Positive Reviews: Beautiful location and facilities right across from Plaza Espana.  The rooms are comfortable, the bathroom with a very nice walk-in shower is excellent. Love the rooftop bar. Great drinks and food

Negative Reviews: We couldnt get the air conditioning to make the room colder and had to open the window a few times because of this.
Positive Reviews: The room was clean modern and had a great view over the plaza. The bathroom was also very nice. The breakfast buffet was superb and access to the roof top bar was great.

Review Title: Would stay again and would highly recommend
Negative Reviews: Poor quality coffee in the room
Positive Reviews: Superbly organised, easy check in and out. Breakfast was very good, super spacious room with fabulous views

Negative Reviews: some slippers in the room would be nice
Positive Reviews: location, food, skybar, the room

Review Title: Great hotel and location. All positive.
Negative Reviews:
Rooftop bar was fantastic however the service up there was a bit haphazard, taking orders, dropping drinks, taking payment was all done
separately x 3 people , you had to wait to order at the table however it was a long wait as not many members of staff could take an order and the ones that could seemed to be slow and chatty elsewhere so it might take asking 4 passing staff to actually get 1 to come and take the order. Would be much more efficient and relaxing to allow more staff members to take orders and immediate payment  or indeed to be allowed  to order at the actual bar even if not sitting in the immediate back it’s,
Positive Reviews: Property was lovely, fantastic location? lovely lobby and reception staff, quick lift system no matter what time of day. Pool very quiet and plenty of beds and umbrellas bar at pool area. Breakfast Buffet 10/10 and large enough to not feel rushed or crowded even at capacity.

Negative Reviews: The only thing that let the hotel down was the service on the rooftop bar. Very hit and miss, with drinks missing from orders and not much concern from the staff taking the orders.
Positive Reviews: Location was great and the room was excellent, especially the Aircon which we needed as it was 39° outside.Staff in lobby, reception and restaurant very friendly and welcoming.

Negative Reviews: Had to buy drinks from pool bar and not allowed to drink own. Odd instance of rude staff member but sure this was just a one off instance during a busy period.
Positive Reviews:
Fantastic location, amazing views from
the rooftop .Clean rooms , great staff generally, fantastic service from reception and concierge. Breakfast and service really good.One staff member a bit rude on the sky bar. Sat me and friend down and then after ordering our drink was told the seats were reserved/unavailable.

Negative Reviews: Nothing or well actually the terrace of the junior suite is so big that it could easily fit in two sun-chairs :) The pool (we didn't use and there was space when we checked it) is relatively small for a hotel that has +580 rooms so having own sun-hairs on a terrace wouldn't be that bad. At least for our terrace the sun keeps coming the whole day.
Positive Reviews: Amazing experience. Staycation with my wife. We loved the hotel, the room (Junior Suite) and the amazing big terrace, the 360 degrees sky bar, glass walking bridge and the breakfast buffet was simply fantastic. If you planning to stay in Madrid and looking for a great hotel experience, this is it. Especially now when the prices are still down this hotel is a perfect choice. The location is also superb and you're right in the downtown and everything is close.

Negative Reviews:
The bathroom was stupidly and unnecessarily hateful. The bathroom's door was just a piece of glass, which didn't offer any kind of noise privacy. In addition, the bathroom light worked with movement. So, when one goes to the bathroom at night, the other one has to wake up and follow. Totally ridiculous. What is this architectural fashion?
There was also water pipe noise and other kind of noises at night. 
The bed was fine per se, but I was not comfortable with the old fashion blanket with sheets covering and tucking in the bed. I would prefer a duvet with a proper cover. 
The last day, they didn't change the bathroom floor towel. So, it was wet.
Positive Reviews: Location, breakfast, spacious room, easy checking in and out.

Negative Reviews: The bathroom floor was dusty and had pub*c hair of whoever was previously in there. Gym equipment was lacking. Pillows were small (ask for bigger ones) but the bed was very comfy....The bathroom left a bad impression but overall it was really good.
Positive Reviews: The breakfast was great, room was spacious and bed comfy. The location is perfect, and hotel ambience really good.

Negative Reviews: it could have been cleaner, one of the “clean” towels had stains on it, the shower was leaking and we could hear the elevators from the room
Positive Reviews: great location, nice rooftop bar, comfy beds, great breakfast

Review Title: Great view in small and hot room
Negative Reviews: The room was at 78.8 degrees every day.I was told the AC gets turned off when its cold outside. They told me to open the window, on the 23rd floor. The noise from sirens and traffic was bad with the window open. The temperature only went down to 74 after 10 hours of keeping it open. The room was very small. There was only 1 chair in the room. The table was placed  in front of the bed. If you sat at the table you blocked the other person from moving through the room.
Positive Reviews: The location,  the view from our room, the breakfast buffet was fantastic, the rooftop bar amazing. The bathroom was spacious,  had good light, and nice shower.

Negative Reviews: One person in our party complained of a musty odor smell on entering the elevator, which triggered her allergies. Also, no ironing board was in the room.
Positive Reviews:
Hotel was centrally located. Immediate access to shops train etc.
Comfortable adequate space in room. We were a family of four. Breakfast was excellent,  a wide variety. We were able to do a late checkout at a reasonable cost. They kindly stored our luggage at no extra cost. I would definitely stay here again.

Negative Reviews: the room is dark because the only window it has, looks to the inside of the building.
Positive Reviews:
i loved the location and the buildling.
the bathroom was spacious and the shower is wonderful, it has very good water pressure and temperature.
the breakfast is wonderful! you have a great selection of ham, cheese, cereal, bread, eggs, etc.
Convenient and safe location. Great facilities and very good breakfast. Very comfortable room.

Review Title: Lovely hotel with fantastic views in great location
Negative Reviews: the lift system takes some getting used to but ok - except on one occasion the door shut so quickly (before you had chance to get in) & hit my sisters arm so hard her arm was very badly bruised & swollen (for weeks) but it didn’t seem to be a recurring problem, so I guess accidents happen
Positive Reviews: location, rooftop pool & bar, comfortable room, breakfast buffet - all excellent

Fabulous hotel, the rooftop bar was outstanding, lovely spacious room, amazing views. Excellent location close to the palace. The breakfast was amazing and we also ate in the restaurant on floor 26. Overall a super experience and would definitley go back. We didn’t find any of the areas over crowded. Yes you had to wait a moment to go over the glass walk way but it wasn’t an inconvenience
Room Type: Superior Deluxe King Room with View

Positive Reviews: Location is a 10. very clean and all the details for a perfect stay. the rooftop bar - a must! breakfast was also very rich. recommend!

Negative Reviews: Quite expensive
Positive Reviews: Location is great very close to Gran Via and other attractions. Sky bar 360 is fabulous. The room and hotel interiors were very stylish. The breakfast was delicious

Negative Reviews: Nothing I didn't like.
Positive Reviews: The hotel was in a great location. Lots of bars and restaurants nearby. The room was very big and it had an amazing view. Rooftop bar was also amazing.

Negative Reviews: nothing.
Positive Reviews: We loved everything! This hotel is, without a doubt, incredible. The comfortable room, the nice and spacious bathroom, the best part is the location of the hotel, in front of plaza españa. The terrace is incredible, that was the first reason we decided to stay here. oh, the breakfast is incredible! Definitely another great reasons to stay here.
The facilities, the location, the rooftop terrace, the bed, the bathroom, the breakfast. We've enjoyed everything :)
Room Type: Deluxe Superior King Room with Terrace

Review Title: Classy and comfortable hotel in a great location
Positive Reviews: This is a lovely hotel. We had a room with a view over the plaza, which was even better at night. The breakfast buffet was very good. The rooftop bar is fantastic and the location was convenient.

Review Title: All of us enjoyed our stay in Riu, value for money. Definitely recommended!
Negative Reviews: Can't think of anything! But I think the hotel picture in booking.com doesn't do justice to the hotel. It looks so much better & newer.
Positive Reviews: My family really enjoyed the buffet breakfast which is included in the room package. The roof top bar access at 26th floor is definitely a bonus. It gave us a good view of Madrid and the glass bridge to see down below is an experience for my teens. Not to mention Zara is just down below. Lots of eateries nearby & the metro is like 1 minute walk from the hotel.

Review Title: Brilliant stay and trip. Would recommend
Negative Reviews: Roof top bar was too busy sometimes due to too many visitors not staying in the hotel
Positive Reviews: Excellent Breakfast and Hotel. All facilities were clean and modern. Rooftop bar and pool were really good. Great location
Room Type: Deluxe Superior King Room with Terrace

Positive Reviews: Everything was on point! The room was spacious and clean, and the bed was really comfy. I enjoyed the view from the window (felt like a movie). Also, there were various foods at the breakfast, tortilla is my favorite!

Review Title: Definitely check out the rooftop bar!
Positive Reviews: Room was comfortable with a wonderful view! I really liked the bathroom especially after staying in hostels most of my visit. I wanted to treat myself with this hotel, and it exceeded my expectations. Highlight was access to the rooftop bar--amazing views, especially at sunset. I was also given access to the rooftop bar after checkout while waiting for a few hours for my train. Breakfast buffet exceeded my expectations with many options!! I felt pampered at this place

Negative Reviews: Bar prices were expensive but that is to be expected. The air con wasn't great
Positive Reviews: Fab room with view, clean and tidy. Loved the sky bar. Great choice for breakfast

Review Title: A lovely hotel for a stay in Madrid.
Negative Reviews: Lifts can take some time to arrive. Roof bar can be quite noisy.
Positive Reviews: Large room and bathroom. Good variety of breakfast food. A great location to bars, restaurants and sightseeing.

Review Title: Great location and amazing value for money
Positive Reviews: Location is amazing and the view is exceptional. Really nice breakfast, exceeded my expectations. The bar upstairs is great, and it is very nice that as a guest of the hotel you don’t need to wait as the line can be long one. The room itself is also very nice, clean with a very good bathroom.
The view of the bedroom and the view from the rooftop bar was just perfect! The room was very comfortable and clean. Breakfast was very good with lots of varieties. The location is also perfect.

Negative Reviews: Lifts a little slow at busy times
Positive Reviews: Great rooftop bar, lovely swimming pool, quite rooms, great breakfast and great location
The hotel is very elegant, clean, and the views are just amazing! The rooms are clean and spacious. The breakfast was lovely. The location of this hotel is brilliant.

Negative Reviews: Quite expensive
Positive Reviews: Location is great very close to Gran Via and other attractions. Sky bar 360 is fabulous. The room and hotel interiors were very stylish. The breakfast was delicious

Review Title: Impressive hotel and views in great location
Negative Reviews: Lifts sometimes were busy and took a long time to arrive
Positive Reviews: Location, clean, spacious, great rooftop bar, it’s had a real buzz, fab food

Review Title: Perfect Stay in a nice location
Negative Reviews: quite busy hotel but nothing that hotel can do about it :)
Positive Reviews: very good location. large rooms with a very nice view. the bathroom was spacious and very clean. the breakfast was good as well
Beautiful hotel, great location, spacious bedroom, amazing breakfast and loved the pool and views from the rooftop bar! One of the best hotels we’ve ever stayed at.

Negative Reviews: Can't think of anything....
Positive Reviews:
Room with a marvelous view (Plaza de Espana). Spacious room for adult with 2 kids. Very clean. Excellent and reach breakfast. Free access to extraordinary roof top from the hotel. Fast check-in/check-out. 
Excellent location: Walking distance to the main central points of interest, shopping and theatres. 5 metro stops to Bernabeu Stadion (we attended a game, great access to/from metro). Closed to many excellent restaurantes and coffee shops.
tip: For a great, start of the day cappuccino, check out "letoh", just 1 minute away from the hotel..

There was a wide choice for breakfast (also for vegetarians), including very good coffee. We had a huge beautiful room with 3 windows with the spectacular view of the Plaza de Espana. The room was soundproofed. The hotel is located on Gran Via street with lots of shops, restaurants and theatres and very close to the metro stop. We also visited Rooftop bar and we enjoyed the wonderful view and vibrant atmosphere (it was for free for hotel guests).

Review Title: excellent stay is this iconic luxury hotel
Negative Reviews: nothing
Positive Reviews: An iconic building built in 1948 (looks like a New York style hotel) it has clearly been modernised in recent times and is finished to a very high standard. Very nice room on floor 22 overlooking the roof top bar on floor 21, with a fantastic view of the city spreading out to the east. Great (large) shower and very comfortable super king sized bed.  Very comprehensive buffet breakfast.

Negative Reviews: Water temperature was to cold.
Positive Reviews: Huge, clean and nice hotel on a perfect location in the city center of Madrid. The hotel is very busy, but everything was very good organized. (lift system, breakfast etc..) And of course, the skybar was amazing!

Negative Reviews: Really nothing here
Positive Reviews: Very comfy room, great location, amazing breakfast and rooftop bar. The concierge also helped us arrange a covid test for our onward travel.

Negative Reviews: I can't think of anything.
Positive Reviews: This is one of the few hotels ever that I can't think of one thing to complain about.  It is a huge hotel but so well organized that it doesn't feel crowded.  The room was spacious, very comfortable and quiet.  The breakfast was great; anything you could want and eggs cooked to order.  The rooftop bar was enjoyable with beautiful views although very busy at times.  The location is spot on; walkable to many sites, restaurants, shops, etc.  There is even a free tourist bus that stops outside on which you can ride to the museums and other sites.

Negative Reviews: When checking in the receptionist didn't register the card correctly, so we had to go all the way back and forth to the reception. It was resolved, but because we arrived late, it was a little annoying.
Positive Reviews: Breakfast, gym, room and view were excellent. We really enjoyed the stay.

Wonderful hotel, with an amazing terrace at the 27th floor from where you have a 360° view on Madrid.
Our room was large and comfortable; the morning breakfast was full of everything you may desire.
On the 21st floor there is a swimming pool (freezing!!) very useful in a hot August in Madrid.
Room Type: Deluxe Superior Twin Room (2 Adults + 1 Child)

Negative Reviews: Bath and separate toilet without ventilation
Positive Reviews:
Restaurant with plenty of choices. Sky view terrace and restaurant were amazing.
Room facilities, Bathroom, and confi beads.

Negative Reviews: A bit unwelcoming personal at the reception. No smiles .
Positive Reviews: Excellent situation. Magnificent view from our room on 22th floor. Very good and abundant buffet breakfast. Private parking, though reasonably expensive.

Review Title: really lovely stay, would return to stay at Rui!
Negative Reviews: Drilling during the day but not the hotels fault. Not sure what they could’ve done to prevent it.
Positive Reviews:
beautiful building, great location! 
Five star breakfast, worth getting up for! 
Bed was big and felt comfortable in a family room with teenagers. 
Roof top bar with views of the city were amazing - be prepared to spend on a drink but worth the treat for the views!

Review Title: Fantastic hotel in a great location
Negative Reviews: Nothing really. 360 bar was a little busy at times but that’s understandable.
Positive Reviews: Lovely location with great rooms and a huge breakfast. 360 bar has amazing views too.
Room Type: Deluxe Superior King Room (2 Adults + 2 Children)

Negative Reviews: Nothing
Positive Reviews:
Exc Hotel in Great location . Very clean. Lots of breakfast choices
The sky bar is a great added bonus with exc views across Madrid . The glass floor viewing space is fabulous.. ..if you don't mind heights !

Review Title: Great Location and value for money!
Positive Reviews:
Lovely hotel in a great location, short walk in to the main town centre with plenty of restaurants and bars around.
Shops also close by.
Room was comfortable and clean, breakfast had plenty of options.

Review Title: Amazing views of the city  from the sky bar.
Negative Reviews: Nothing
Positive Reviews: Clean and comfortable hotel in a great location. Breakfast buffet was excellent. The views from the sky bar were amazing.

Review Title: Very nice hotel, amazing location and impressive roof bar. Very nice breakfast.
Negative Reviews: Personally I prefer smaller hotel when ravelling alone.
Positive Reviews: I likes my room view from the 18th floor , the room was nice and spacious, the sky bar is amazing, the breakfast is quite good. This hotel is very well organised and the locations could not be more central: it is in Plaza se Espana. Amazing!

Review Title: Well located in a luxury hotel at affordable price
Negative Reviews: Nothing. Very nice stay
Positive Reviews: EXCELLENT BUFFET. Great location to visit Madrid, very clean and spacious.

Negative Reviews: The roof terrace gets packed but it’s understandable. At least hotel guests have priority.
Positive Reviews: As always, Roy doesn’t disappoint. The location is lovely, rooms are nice and bright and spacious and the breakfast is wonderful.

Central location
Clean, comfortable, spacious room
Excellent breakfast
Great location! Awesome buffet breakfast! Great rooms! With great views! We lo ed the location near plaza de españa and la gran via!
Room Type: Superior Deluxe King Room with View

Review Title: will defiantly stay again and will recommend.
Negative Reviews: the only dislike was that it was very busy.
Positive Reviews: The room space was excellent as well as the breakfast room. And the location was superb.

Really enjoyed the breakfast with lots of variety to choose from. The room was quiet and the bed comfortable. The rooftop bar was much better than I was expecting, great view and nice drinks. Don't miss it!

Negative Reviews: Do not give early check in, we arrive at 10:00 AM after 9 hr travel and charge me a full price of a night from 10:00 AM to 3:00 PM on my Anniversary day.
Positive Reviews: The 360 roof top bar and the room’s view. very clean and breakfast.
Room Type: Superior Deluxe King Room with View

Negative Reviews:
Lift system is confusing and at times there is a long wait for a lift.
360 bar gets very busy and you can feel a little rushed to finish your drink & leave. 
A £10 and 20€ note went missing from our room, unfortunately we couldn't prove this was taken by the cleaner but we knew it wasn't spent or lost so it must have been taken... be aware!
Positive Reviews:
Location was great, hotel was immaculate, staff were very friendly & helpful, lots of choice at breakfast. 
Room was a good size, clean and well looked after.

Negative Reviews:
pool is so tiny there’s always a queue 
for beds. there’s another sun terrace but they 
wont provide parasols there which makes no 
sense. pool staff are considerably less friendly
then the rest of the hotel.
Positive Reviews:
beautiful decor, immaculately clean, great value 
for money. 
perfect location for exploring Madrid. all of the 
staff were very friendly especially Gabriel on 
check in and the door men. breakfast is great 
with lots of choice

Review Title: An experience at the Top of Madrid!
Negative Reviews: The terrace was overcrowded. Apart from that, everything else was AMAZING!
Positive Reviews: Breakfast was full of choices and tasteful. Room was simply awesome and the Gran Via's view was STUNNING from the room's window. Staff was attentive and friendly.

Review Title: very nice place with amazing view on top floor
Negative Reviews: crowded but organised
Positive Reviews: location,staff,clean and breakfast.

Negative Reviews:
Pool not opened
Lobby Bar not big
Positive Reviews: Room.   Location. Staff. Breakfast

Review Title: Great 4-star hotel, with excellent location and remarkable views,
Negative Reviews: Their garage cannot be recommended, it has direct access to the lobby but it is narrow and not practical at all. There are alternatives close by.
Positive Reviews: Great 4-star hotel, with excellent location and remarkable views, first-class breakfast and comfortable room. Also very nice staff.

Review Title: would definitely stay there! excellent location!
Negative Reviews: elevators are small, mattress is a little stiff, pillows are too thin and you only have one thick blanket for the suite.
Positive Reviews: it’s in a perfect centralized location, staff was outstanding, rooms were squeaky clean! excellent location! FREE BREAKFAST which was outstanding!

Negative Reviews:
For this level of establishment towels were thin and of poor quality- no robes provided either. 
OK. Provision of  a coffee machine and better tea choices is really expected when paying over £200 a night.
Positive Reviews: Excellent location...right next to metro. Easy to walk to many main sites.  Good Glazing meant a quiet room. Comfortable beds, good buffet breakfast. Staff were friendly and helpful.

Review Title: Great hotel. Location was fabulous. Breakfast was amazing .
Negative Reviews: The gym was not as good as I had hoped .
Positive Reviews: The hotel is so central, the staff were helpful, the rooms were very clean and the breakfast was amazing.

Negative Reviews: Some of the towels had stains
Positive Reviews: Awesome breakfast buffet, friendly staff, very clean, great location...Really a great hotel

Negative Reviews: nothing it was all very good , if I am being extremely picky the elevator system can get congested and cause some waiting.
Positive Reviews: amazing location , room size , bed, checkin was efficient . Breakfast was amazing , good variety and service quick.

Review Title: Enjoyable stay but would have liked to have been informed of building works etc. Very helpful staff. Breakfast was lovel
Negative Reviews:
was not informed that the rooftop bar would be closed. Building work outside the hotel was noisy. 
Not enough options for lunch or dinner in the hotel. 
Toilet constantly flushing in the bathroom.
Positive Reviews: Great location, friendly & helpful staff. Lovely room & breakfast.

Review Title: Great location, staff, rooms and breakfast but a few areas to improve to make it outstading
Negative Reviews:
It is a large hotel and at times gets very very busy, particularly in the lobby when a big group signs in
Breakfast was extensive and procedures well organised but very crowded at times
Room a/c system did not respond to adjustments
Bathroom safety light is far far too bright - it wakes up everyone in the room if someone gets up in the night!
Bedroom condiments - tea, coffee, etc were not replaced once in our five day stay, that's really poor.
Positive Reviews:
Location was perfect for the old town, the palace, the Metro.
Room on 19 floor was quiet and modern
Staff very polite and friendly
Covid procedures were excellent. 
Lift system is very clever
Breakfast was extensive and a good standard

Negative Reviews:
drinks/food were expensive 
we had ants in our room 
we were only given 1 key to the room
Positive Reviews:
rooftop bar 
location 
breakfast was lovely 
most staff were very helpful with the exception of 1/2 at the rooftop bar
Room Type: Deluxe Superior King Room with Terrace

Review Title: comfortable despite all the confusion created by the hotel because of parking issues
Negative Reviews:
Beyond the above, I think Rui plaza is an over rated hotel . They claim to have a private parking but last minute we were informed that parking was not possible as some other company handled the parking. This forced us to look for parking elsewhere in the crowded centre of Madrid.
The hotel is just too huge for personalised service. Also, be prepared for basic amenities in the room including just one small bottle of water for two persons.
Positive Reviews: The rooms were very clean. And the location was excellent. The waiters and bell boys are very friendly . The two restaurants on the 26th and 27th floor offer brilliant views.
Room Type: Deluxe Superior King Room with Terrace

Negative Reviews: The hallways and even our room (considering we had a terrace) had very dim lighting.  A corner lampshade would have helped in ours.  There were no slippers or robes and I’ve never been to any hotel with an empty mini bar.  There was only instant coffee and tea.  Staff response was great when we requested some items.
Positive Reviews:
Great location in the heart of Madrid.
Easy access to the SkyBar.
Breakfast buffet: efficient staff and wide selection of food  and drinks.

Negative Reviews:
Breakfast area a free for all at busy times.
Construction work nearby with quite a bit of noise to be heard in room from 8:00 am.
No Irish whisky in rooftop bar!!
Positive Reviews:
Location was excellent.  Great variety at breakfast to suit all tastes.   Staff very efficient and friendly.
Rooftop bar is a must.

Review Title: Excellent, and bonus for us was priority booking for the El Eden Restaurant and the 360 Rooftop Bar
Negative Reviews: The only thing I would say is the tea/coffee making facility in the room only provided sachets of powdered cream, which really did not go well with the breakfast tea...it would of been nice to have the long life milk pods for this at least.
Positive Reviews:
Hotel staff all friendly and helpful
Breakfast was plentiful and great variety.
El Eden Restaurant served amazing tapas dishes and the views are to die for...thoroughly enjoyed our lunch there.
360 Rooftop Bar also is fantastic and the glass walkways are superb, 
We would have no hesitation in recommending and look forward to coming back.

Review Title: Perfect location, friendly staff, great breakfast, acces to sky bar
Negative Reviews: pool was overcrowded every time of the day
Positive Reviews: Perfect location, friendly staff, great breakfast, acces to sky bar

Review Title: Amazing stay, will be recommending to others.
Negative Reviews: The elevators take a while sometimes but apart from that everything else was great.
Positive Reviews: Lovely property, staff were very welcoming. Location is great right off the main shopping street with lots of restaurants and bars. Rooftop bar at the hotel was the highlight of our trip. Staff at the bar were lovely and remembered us every single night. Don’t have a bad thing to say about this hotel and will be recommending it to my family and friends.

Review Title: Spain is the best place I have visited. I am excited to repeat this experience.
Negative Reviews: Everything was excellent for us in and out of the hotel. The Spanish gastronomy is unique. They have excellent transportation and the prices are very affordable. The weather was so nice; we traveled in September and the temperature was amazing. Do not hesitate to travel to Spain. You will have some unforgettable days.
Positive Reviews: The location was perfect. The view from my terrace was wonderful and the service was very nice and professional. The food was incredible in all places. Special mention to Dayana at Skybar, a wonderful place with incredible Madrid views, Yosseft from the Lobby Bar, and Ismelly and Hector, bell boys.They are wonderful people who do their work with dedication and professionalism. The Riu Plaza Espana was the best decision to stay in this beautiful city and its staff has 5 starts . I highly recommend it.
Room Type: Deluxe Superior King Room with Terrace

Review Title: Very nice 6 night stay at RIU Plaza Espana
Negative Reviews: The 360 bar on the 27th floor has a great view, but if you're seeking out a place for a relaxing drink, this is not the place. Understandably it gets very crowded.
Positive Reviews: After staying 6 nights at the RIU Plaza Espana, I was extremely impressed with how hard the staff worked to make our stay a very pleasant one. The breakfast buffet was excellent, with numerous food offerings for many diverse tastes.  The room was good size and very clean. This is not a small boutique hotel, but a very large hotel that caters to both numerous tourists and corporate meetings so it can get crowded at times. As someone visiting Madrid for the 1st, the location of the hotel across the street from a subway station made it very easy for my wife and I to get around the city. There is also a varied assortment of restaurants in the area and a nearby grocery if you plan on staying a number of nights.

Negative Reviews: The staff at the 360 view bar needs to be more  customer oriented and friendly. Beautiful bar with great views, but unfortunately,  the staff does not take into consideration the client’s  comfort, and have no interest in making the clients happy.. Bar staff need improvement!
Positive Reviews:
Location, facilities, breakfast,  room view.
The reception and bell boys staff are just great! Feels like coming back to home every time we go.

Negative Reviews: The carpet in the room was awful, like hard plastic rug you get in a shop. No duvet on the bed just a sheet, was cold in the night, then found a blanket in the cupboard. No guide to Madrid or the hotel in the room. Breakfast room was noisy and like a train station . Wall shower in the room just leaked everywhere so had to use overhead one but not good for women as hair gets wet.
Positive Reviews: Was in 1205. Fab balcony with views. Rooftop bar was great. Location central which was really good. Breakfast food was good and fresh. Nice big room.
Room Type: Deluxe Superior King Room with Terrace

Negative Reviews: As rooftop bar and  main bar open to public it’s gets very busy and you can not always get a table . It’s packed with people coming to see the glass floor . So  busy sometimes hard to get served for drinks etc. Had to drink inside sometimes as no room . Should have section for residents only.
Positive Reviews: Location opposite Royal Palace. Massive hotel that is fantastic. Lovely rooms. Clean . Roof top bar . Nice indoor bar. Bar food good

Negative Reviews: Staff didnt bring extra water to my room and I had to request over several days.  The hotel checkin did not include an orientation to madrid (aka these metro lines are free, Prado is free at this time, etc etc).  Email customer service could be better.
Positive Reviews: It has a great location, room overlooked the Plaza Espana, close to bus and metro stops. Located right next to stores and restaurants on Gran Via.   Terrace rooftop was excellent. Hotel guests get free access and immediate seating.  Very good breakfast buffet.

Review Title: The view from the corredor outside was very pretty and it’s central which is good + they have a rooftop bar, a restauran
Negative Reviews: couldn’t open the window properly, in the night it was heavy to sleep cause of no air in the room, the safe didn’t work and after the third time talking to someone they fixed it, most of the staff wasn’t friendly, one tiny bottle of water for two people
Positive Reviews: cleanness, looks of the room, free water and tea, free access to the gym, breakfast was nice, that it was central

Review Title: Good base of exploration in Madrid
Negative Reviews: As others have mentioned, during weekends expect to queue for breakfast and elevators a lot. Also didn't find the pillows and bed that comfortable compared to other 4**** hotels. Additionally we requested a quiet room, got room 601 where the noise of the elevators kept us up all night. Next day requested a room change, got room 1125, sadly more or less very close to the elevators as well, but slightly better soundproofed. Light switch for bathroom and toilet are in the sleeping room, so a night-visit to any of those, means waking up your partner with bright lights as there is no way to turn the light on after entering.
Positive Reviews: Huge hotel for mass tourism. Up to date rooms, excellent location, facilities and breakfast buffet. Room with free upgrade relatively big, with double bed and separate bed / bathroom. View across plaza d espana very inspiring, rooftop bar with glass bridge perfect for selfies (unless afraid of height). Recommended for a city trip if you don't mind the business that come with hotels of this size. For the price we paid good value for money. For the prices we overheard others paid, not very good value for money (>100 EUR per night!)

Negative Reviews: Access to parking requires you to briefly enter a low emissions area.
Positive Reviews:
Fabulous breakfast. Fantastic rooftop bar.  Room spacious. Very good bed. Bathroom was spacious. 
Location is perfect to discover all the nice places in Madrid

Review Title: Top choice for Madrid. Highly recommended
Negative Reviews: The gym is ok, but should be bigger and better equipped, for a hotel of this quality
Positive Reviews: Everyhing top notch. Great position, great 27th floor rooftop bar, with a view worth the one from atop the cathedral. Large and very well-furnished room and bath. Great Breakfast. Greatly planned elevator system, by which you present your card OUTSIDE the elevators and depending which floor you have to go, the system chooses for you. With this system, elevator waiting time is reduced to zero

Negative Reviews: That the swimming pool wasn’t open yet
Positive Reviews:
Great breakfast
great location
Big room and bathroom
Very clean
rooftop bar

Review Title: Very helpful reception staff. Helped and advised us regarding trips, where to go, etc.
Negative Reviews: Downstairs lobby is a little small but, nevertheless, nicely appointed.
Positive Reviews: Fabulous hotel in a lovely location - close to the Palace. The Sky Bar and restaurant are really cool - day or night.For a 27 floor hotel, the elevators were great. Everything spotlessly clean.

Negative Reviews: Not much info given about the hotel facilities
Positive Reviews: Rooftop Bar was amazing, rooms very spacious & high quality. Breakfasts very good buffet style, great location.

Negative Reviews: Rooftop swimming pool is tiny and overcrowded.
Positive Reviews: Delicious breakfasts, clean and spacious rooms. Amazing panoramic views on Madrid.

Negative Reviews:
Pool is very nice  and great temperature but horribly hot deck surface with unreal pool rules. No shoes only sandals.. in a hotel that doesn’t have slippers in the room. 
A hotel of this size and it doesn’t offer 24 hour food room service.
Positive Reviews: The location of this hotel is central to everything in Madrid. The food service if ok, but should have full service dining and 24 hour room service. Pool is very nice  and great temperature but horribly hot deck surface with unreal pool rules. No shoes only sandals.. in a hotel that doesn’t have slippers in the room.

Negative Reviews:
Breakfast, as most buffet restaurants, not the best. Wouldn't pay for it if I stayed there again.
Not my biggest concern, but if as my partner, you do like relaxing with the TV on, if you're an English speaker, there will be no channels for you to do so. There were over 200 TV channels, I seem to remember 4 of them were in English, only 2 worked, and they were both News channels, definitely not what you expect from a good hotel :/ (and no, there was no option to change series and films on other channels to their original language)
Positive Reviews: Perfect location, great rooms, staff were lovely! Amazing amazing views, very nice rooftop to have a drink and enjoy Madrid.

Negative Reviews: The lift system was confusing at first, no quiet area to relax. The drinks prices were exorbitant €9.50 glass of red wine and €4.50 for a coffee.
Positive Reviews: The location was excellent. Very clean and quiet room. Breakfast buffet good lots of variety staff efficient and pleasant.

Review Title: Convenient location, comfortable stay and amazing views from the rooftop
Negative Reviews: The lunch / dinner menu is very limited and the food is not tasty.
Positive Reviews: Location, comfortable bed, easy check in and check out, helpful staff, breakfast buffet, rooftop, small pool

Negative Reviews: Price of Drink was quite high
Positive Reviews: Service ...food ...staff...decor...location...room

Negative Reviews: The rooftop is open to the public so it’s obviously very busy and we didn’t really get a chance to enjoy it properly as there are so many people just taking pictures. Quite a long wait for drinks due to how many people are there. Guests do get priority when it comes to being seated though which is a positive.
Positive Reviews: The view was great, staff were lovely. We had daily access to the pool and it wasn’t too busy, didn’t have trouble getting a bed at all.  Breakfast was nice and never had a long wait to be seated. There was a pride festival concert going on outside when we arrived that went on until around 2am but with the windows closed the noise didn’t bother us at all!

Negative Reviews: Most of the staff were very helpful, however the doormen wouldn't always be paying attention to who was arriving, and more than once we saw older couple trying to open the heavy doors on their own!
Positive Reviews: Great selection of food at breakfast, room cleaning service was fantastic and the location was absolutely ideal

Negative Reviews: The lift system can be annoying when you want to visit others not in your floor. The staff in the sky bar were rather rude and abrupt,  we were told 3 times not to sit until the table was cleared,  I was with my mother who had back issues and needed to sit,  why did it take 3 people to say you can't sit rather than them just clearing the table,  I am quite happy to take the glasses and wipe the table if the people telling us not to sit feel it is below their station and would rather make my mother stand in pain!
Positive Reviews: The location was great, rooms were lovely with great bathroom. Breakfast was always good with lots to choose from and staff were attentive. Check in and customer service staff were very helpful.

Review Title: Nice hotel, well situated but security staff were unpleasant and inhospitable.
Negative Reviews: The security staff at the foyer were unpleasant. I was shouted at by a security staff member for wandering up the main stairs to the second floor to have a look around. I was shouted at to come down even though the area was openly accessible  ie not cordoned off and there were no functions underway. On a second occasion I was brusquely asked in an unpleasant manner at the door whether I was a resident. The hotel was not cheap and I do not expect to be treated in a discourteous manner by staff.
Positive Reviews: Fabulous room with city view on 15th floor. Checkin was friendly and efficient. Breakfast was fine and dining staff were friendly , helpful and very efficient.

Review Title: During our stay i had birthday and got a gift surprise.😊
Negative Reviews: Rooftop bar wasn’t the top service as expected.Many of waitress and waiters doesn’t speak english and had attitude .
Positive Reviews: Excellent location,amazing view,tasty and variety breakfast!Kind staff , clean and big room with fabulous view !

Review Title: Comfortable and best views of Madrid
Negative Reviews: service at the 360 rooftop sky bar was slow and not as attentive as i would have liked - sat down around 23.45 and only got served around 00.15 - plenty of staff but nobody seemed to be in charge of serving us. I understand their day is long and the amount of tourists flooding the bar, constantly is overwhelming, however the bar was quiet at this time and there were plenty of staff members around. when my Mojito finally arrived, I had to send it back as mint in it was rotten. very underwhelming.
Positive Reviews: Great location, fabulous views of the city. Reception, luggage and breakfast staff were excellent. My room was ready and available two hours before check in time.

Review Title: Everything you need for a great stay.
Negative Reviews:
The breakfast food range whilst good lacked a bit in the fruit, vegetable and pastry range but all in all, it was good. Coffee was very average though and that probably came down to the beans and the grind settings which only provided for weak coffee. It took me three espresso shots and one cappuccino shot out of the machine to make one decent coffee.
The pool was a bit of a disappointment in that it was so small. No atmosphere.
Positive Reviews:
Breakfast was good and extremely well organised. This catered for the very big crowds that were expected through. The breakfast staff worked like a well oiled machine and need to be commended for a fabulous effort. 
The reception staff were also great and managed the busy crowds as they came on through.
Finally, if you are a guest and you want to access the rooftop bar, spaces are reserved for hotel guests so that you have a good chance of grabbing a seat, otherwise, you would not stand much of a chance given that the rooftop bar is quite the tourist attraction. Great views to be had as well.

Review Title: A hotel experience worthy of majestic Madrid
Negative Reviews: Restaurant on the 26th floor did not serve real meals, just tapas. It would have been nice to have some fresh salads.
Positive Reviews: It was an excellent location, staff were very friendly and helpful, the buffet breakfasts were very well managed given the many guests,and the visible security personnel and secure elevator system were very reassuring. The rooftop bar was spectacular!

Negative Reviews: The only minor difficulty is they do not offer a very early breakfast, or at least a packed option to go when you need to leave early.
Positive Reviews: Beautiful hotel with a great location. Best views of Madrid from rooftop. Excellent breakfast with a great variety of hot and cold items. You will even find tortilla and Churros with hot chocolate. The staff is very welcoming, efficient and nice. Great location at Plaza de Espana, great Christmas  atmosphere and Christmas Market.
Room Type: Deluxe Superior King Room with Terrace

Review Title: Had a lovely stay and would recommend!
Negative Reviews: Food at the hotel was quite overpriced.
Positive Reviews:
Great location, very central. Breakfast had lots of options every morning! 
Front desk staff were very friendly and helpful. 
The rooftop bar was a great addition.

Negative Reviews: Would have been nicer to have more choices of food in the main restaurant for dinner
Positive Reviews: Breakfast had lots of choices! It was delicious and friendly staff. Love the sky bar, the view , the decorations of the building, nice and modern, location was perfect!! Definitely coming back again !

Negative Reviews: The rooftop bar provided an unequalled experience; unfortunately, service did not match that.
Positive Reviews: Almost everything was just about perfect. The staff were exceptional, the location was excellent, the facilities were top notch and the breakfast could not have been better. Based on my experience here, I will look for ‘RIU’ properties in other cities.

Negative Reviews: service on the roof top bar was disappointing
Positive Reviews: location, service, excellent breakfast, roof today bar with spectacular views over the city

Review Title: luxury hotel in the centre of Madrid with exceptional staff.
Negative Reviews: Our only negative experience was in the panoramic restuarant Eden on the 26th floor.The food and service was well  below the standard which we were expecting from this luxury hotel,no better than a mediocre restuarant. But with outrageous prices.Not worth the excesive price just to have panoramic views when you can go one floor higher to the roof terrace and have the same views without the high cost.
Positive Reviews: What can I say...this is a luxury, 4 star,famous hotel in the centre of Madrid in the Plaza de España.The room was exceptional and on the 23rd floor we had panoramic views of the city.The room with seperate bathroom was huge in comparison with other hotels we have stayed in.It was exceptionally clean and the bed was king size and extremely comfortable.The breakfast selection was unbelievable,with every conceivable option,including on new year day,roast beef or turkey with veg and roast potatoes.The Staff are incredible,there seems to be a member of staff in every corner just waiting to greet,help,advise or open doors for guests,there seemed to be more staff than guests.This is a 4 star hotel and feels like a 5 star.We were treated like royalty.

Review Title: A lovely hotel in a fantastic location - the roof top bar is a unique experience.
Negative Reviews: Maybe inform guests if their particular room will have a restricted view during the booking process as it may not always be possible to accommodate a change of room. It really made a difference to our stay once we moved rooms.
Positive Reviews: We initially had a medium sized room with restricted views - after requesting a move to a room with a better view we moved the following day to a much larger room with a fabulous view, thank you :) The breakfast was brilliant and very well organised. All staff at the hotel were very welcoming, helpful and friendly.

Negative Reviews: the air conditioning didn’t appear to be working and we found the room stuffy
Positive Reviews: we arrived 3 hours early and the friendly staff accommodated this and let us have the room - loved the views and the rooftop bar

Negative Reviews:
The pool - it's tiny for the size of the hotel and thenumber of guests, especially if coming in Madrid's very hot summer
The first day the waiting time was 1 hour and you had to queue under the sun
Positive Reviews:
The service was amazing - all the staff took extra mile to make our stay enjoyable
The family room was wide - 2 TVs and 2 independent spaces
Views from the room and from 27th floor were spectacular

Review Title: Beautiful property in a great area of Madrid with professional staff.
Negative Reviews: The room was not ready when I arrived at 12:30pm due to cleaning so I walked some errands until 3pm.
Positive Reviews: Beautiful room and comfortable location with highly professional and caring staff. Fantastic view of Plaza Espana. My requested taxi for the airport was available before the requested time and ready to go.

Negative Reviews: pay close attention to what the customer looks for when he reserves the room
Positive Reviews: Amazing space and location, people at front desk and all the others were very helpful, even though was not what i asked but they gave me a quiet and comfortable  room, loved the 360º rooftop bar by the way

Negative Reviews:
Standard double rooms have the interior view (practilly facing another wall) which is not clearly described on booking.com. and was an unpleasant surprise. RIU kindly upgraded us to a room with the view because we were staying for 5 nights. Therefore, this review is not on the standard room category. 
Solarium is often closed for private events which means that there are even less sun beds available and the pool side becomes super crowded.
Positive Reviews: One of the best hotel experiences we've had and we travel regularly. Everything worked perfectly starting from check in and ending with express check out. The staff is very helpful, friendly and smiley. Thank you for making us feel so welcome. The breakfast selection is fantastic, cannot fault it in any kind of way. Rooms are good, no thrills, but solid 4*. The view is stunning from the roof top and some rooms. The location is fab for exploring Madrid. It is right in the heart of it and the metro stop is literally less than 1 minute away. The roof top pool and solarium are a must in summer Madrid; though they get very crowded and it might take time to actually find a free sun bed. I got lucky :). We would love to stay in RIU again next time we visit the fantastic city of Madrid. Gracias!

Review Title: Almost a perfect hotel, only the airconditioning was bad!
Negative Reviews: Heating vs airconditioning. The hotel has a heating/airconditioning system that only one of the 2 is working. At the end of May(?) the hotel switches the heating for the whole hotel to airconditioning. We were there in april and for me as a North-European it was hot in the room (25 degrees Celsius, the sun was heating the room for a long time). But then you cannot switch to airconditioning. It was not clear on the Booking.com site, otherwise I certainly did not choose this hotel, even the rest of the hotel is superb. I heard more North-European people complaint about this. The manager I was complaining to (Johan) told me he was going to discuss this item with the RIU direction. I hope they can change this? If so I will come back again.
Positive Reviews: Location, breakfast, friendly staff

Negative Reviews: A bit small room
Positive Reviews: Great location, good breakfast, helpful people

Positive Reviews:

Going back again! This is now our favourite hotel in Madrid

Positive Reviews: The breakfast is good and the location is great . Staff is nice

Negative Reviews: There was no spoon for shoose in the room.
Positive Reviews: Staff, food, Covid-19 organization, location were perfect. Lifts functioning is unusual and covid19 safe.

Review Title: This was the perfect hotel for us, our small family, and in such a great location.
Negative Reviews: The only thing that was a nuisance were the elevators. Many of them were not working, especially after breakfast time. A few times we had to walk down the stairs with our two small children and stroller, and then take the elevator from the main level. It was truly a hassle, and there was no explanation provided.
Positive Reviews: The hotel exceeded our expectations. We were so comfortable. The room was enormous and well air condition, and perfect for our arrival from America especially since we had two small children with us. The staff was so friendly and the breakfast was amazing. We loved it, and really filled up each morning! I loved the location as well. I do appreciate that the hotel let us check in so early and that the price of the room was reasonable. We will definitely come back.

Negative Reviews: The elevators are a little confusing but there is hotel staff stationed at the elevators to help!
Positive Reviews:
Wow! This hotel was AMAZING! From the time we stepped in to check in until check out, the service was exceptional. We stayed here for our last night in Madrid after staying at a perfect apartment. We wanted to stay here for our last night to enjoy the rooftop. What a great decision. This hotel is very busy and right on Gran Via. Our rooms were simply exceptional; clean, beautiful, quiet, and comfortable. We went to an early dinner on Gran Via, then up to the rooftop for drinks and sunset. It was very busy, but because we were hotel guests, we got a table and enjoyed drinks! The views from our room and the rooftop were exceptional. Breakfast was the best breakfast we have ever had in any hotel! When we checked out, our Uber pulled right in front of the hotel. I cannot say enough good things about this hotel. STAY HERE if you get the opportunity. The staff goes out of their way to make you feel welcome. 
*Don't let the crowds on the rooftop discourage you. There's plenty of room up there and crossing the bridge is so awesome!

Review Title: Comfortable stay in a huge hotel with a great location
Negative Reviews:
We were given a room with no view, small window.  Not very deluxe!!
Busy check in
Positive Reviews: Great roof top bar, lots of staff and good food. Great views of the city.

Negative Reviews: our room is facing inside the building, so we totally has no view nor light…although we got a high floor.
Positive Reviews: lovely hotel and great location. our flight arrived early in the morning and staff let us check in right away. the breakfast buffet is very good, also the staff are very helpful. the view of rooftop bar is stunning, hotel guests can go there without extra fee.

Negative Reviews: The restaurant food choice were limited and it was extremely busy as non guests could use the facilities on floor 26 and 27. It would have been nice to have a good restaurant for guests only where you could sit and relax and enjoy a nice quiet dinner
Positive Reviews: Hotel was beautifu, the staff were amazing. The rooftop bar and views magnificent.Breakfast fantastic they provide everything you could possibly want and as much as you wanted.l

Review Title: First class hotel in an exceptional location with world class views of Madrid
Negative Reviews: Only one small detail at the rooftop.  You couldn't run a tab, which is usual in US hotels of this class.  The waitress seemed to be starting in the position and her service was not up to standards, which is unusual in Spain where the service is always exceptional.  The manager was around and, as expected, was a professional.  Well, it doesn't really matter because everyone has a first day in the job...
Positive Reviews: The breakfast was very good, as usual in this type of hotel.  The staff was perfect, including the baggage/deposit person who took care of our bags until we were able to check in.  The hotel is very well located and has a wonderful lounge in the roof with the best views of Madrid.  Well worth the price.

Negative Reviews: Room service wait a little long.
Positive Reviews: Location and view superb. Brilliant for connecting with public transport. Very comfortable, spacious room. Excellent choice at breakfast, food delicious and great coffee.

Negative Reviews: The overall experience was good and I would come back again. We didn't spent a lot of time in the hotel as we used our short stay to visit beautiful Madrid. No negative experiences, the only part I would improve is they use too much paper packaging for the room service. One evening we ordered room service (the food was good, so it was worth it, especially with tired and hungry kids), but it came all packed in paper boxes and single use plastic cutlery. And even if it was compostable, it still looked like a lot of garbage being produced. I understand they have to make it eficient, but I personally prefer the classical room service, with usual plates and cutlery.
Positive Reviews: For the kids it was a great experience, as our room was at the 18th floor, but not with a front view so it was not the best view you could get (it was still nice). They also were happy with the breakfast buffet (which was varied and reminded them of Disneyland) and loved the Sky bar view. For the adults it was at par with other 4 stars locations. Very good location, as you can walk to the main attractions.

Positive Reviews: Excellent location. Delightful lobby staff.Wide choice of food at breakfast.

Negative Reviews: You need to get in a queue almost everywhere starting from check in to the hotel, during the breakfast etc.. especially if you go to the breakfast in between 09-10am; you will likely have to wait around 15 mins minimum to find a table to sit and eat! Although there are many elevators in the hotel, during the prime times, you will also likely have to wait for the elevators!
Positive Reviews: The hotel has an excellent location and is very close to (walking distance) the living parts of the city. Moreover, hotel has a roof bar at 26th and 27th floors where you can have an excellent bird view of the city as you drink and eat something. Breakfast options were also plenty- much more than the average of an European hotel. Housekeeping was also excellent, everyday our room was being cleaned and towel got changed.

Negative Reviews:
One thing l could point out, that l would change would be, introducing a time frame for non residents wanting to visit the 360° rooftop.  Reason being, it gets too overcrowded and this "time frame" will avoid the residents having to be waiting in such a small area with those which are only visiting.
Also having access via lifts, to visit a family member say from an 18th floor to 12th floor at their rooms.
Positive Reviews:
Location was fantastic.  The staff extremely helpful, especially the door man, bell boy and the waiters/waitress, excellent manners towards the residents of the hotel whilst given us a touch of humour entering and exiting the premises.
Breakfast outstanding,  and the staff in general made us feel at home.
Loved the Rooftop atmosphere and the view is breathless.

The elevators’ intelligent system might be overwhelming, and the rooftop, although a top attraction, is often crowded due to being open to the public, impacting guests’ experiences. The repeated inquiries from staff on each floor can become bothersome, though it seems to be a flaw in the property’s design rather than the fault of the personnel.

Review Title: Perfect stay for a birthday weekend in Madrid
Negative Reviews: Nothing! I don't have any negatives about this hotel - everything was superb.
Positive Reviews: I booked a room with terrace.  This was located on the 10th floor and had views including the Palace.  The terrace was a good size and we enjoyed sitting before a night out and enjoying a glass of wine.  The rooftop bar was good - quite reasonable.  The pool area was small but the facilities were good and it accommodated people well.  Friendly staff - I arranged for champagne on arrival for my boyfriend's birthday and this was arranged with ease.  Bed was comfortable and our room was a really good size with toiletries and also ironing facilities which is handy.  Excellent location with a Metro station literally outside.

The staff was very helpful and the facilities are all quite new. We came at the end of the season and we got a free upgrade of our room. Make sure to go to the rooftop bar where you can get using hotel elevator (and skipping a considerable waiting line for non-guests). This hotel is a few minutes from the Royal Palace and the city center, perfect for our few days sightseeing trip.

Review Title: FANTASTICO! MAGNIFICO! VIVA HOTEL RIU MADRID!!!
Negative Reviews: NONE. Nada!
Positive Reviews: HOTEL RIU PLAZA ESPAÑA may be the best accommodation I have ever stayed in my years of travelling! From entering the hotel until the very last moments of staying, the hotel experience is very memorable for me! I was welcomed by a receptionist named Paulino in such a friendly and understanding manner. He upgraded my room to a superior deluxe room with a spacious terrace that has amazing views of Central Madrid! He also explained to me all the amenities that this hotel is offering to its customers! I even got a phone call after checking in to see if the room was alright and nevertheless, it exceeded my expectations! All of the staff were just approachable - and as a solo traveller, I had such a wonderful experience in terms of relaxation and living the nightlife in Madrid with such a happy feeling and contentment! I would love to go back again to this hotel when I visit Madrid again which will be very real soon. Muchas gracias, Paulino and to the rest of Hotel Riu Madrid staff!!!

Positive Reviews:
The hotel is exceptional! Our trips in Europe started from Italy, and this is the 7th cities, also the 7th hotel we stayed. With the price, I didn't expected much, the hotels we stayed were more expensive, but couldn't compare to this one at all.  
Location: It's located in the center of Madrid, from window, I can see the plaza. It's walking distance to many visiting places.
The views: From our window, we can see the whole city. At top of the hotel, you can see the city 360 degree. 
The atmosphere here is very lovely. 
High tech is everywhere at this hotel, form elevator, air conditional control, etc. 
Staffs are very friendly,   Qadriel was the person we saw first and last at the front desk and gave us lots of good suggestions, he is a warm-hearted person !
In one word, the hotel itself is a visit spot at Madrid, and we had a great time here, and will defiantly book this hotel again if we will go to Madrid again! Highly recommended!

Review Title: it was completely ruined by the way I was treated in the hotel.
Negative Reviews:
I was unlucky with the quality of service.
I believe the hotel of that standard should be more attentive to and caring about their guests and the guests needs. But I was not treated well.
First of all, I booked this hotel solely for the rooftop bar and swimming pool and 360 terrace, to enjoy the last day of my stay in Madrid. 
The swimming pool bar was not working, and there was no prior notification when I was booking, otherwise I would have booked smith else. I had to bring a drink with myself upstairs so I could relax and read my book, and maybe have a dip. 
The person who hand offs the towels in the swimming pool told me that the glass is not permitted. When I asked her what to do, she said she will call her colleague to bring me a plastic cup instead.
Instead, they called a security person. It was so intimidating, I could not believe what was happening and how I was treated. In the end, I was so upset that I cried the rest of the evening sitting in my room. The last night in Madrid, instead of enjoying myself on the 360 rooftop I was crying in the hotel room. 
Guests should not be treated this way. I would expect smith like that from 2-3 star hotel. But from 4 star expensive worldwide chain hotel where room per night costs £250-320 - that is not acceptable. I would never stay in this hotel chain again, and neither of my friends and family.
Also, when the next day I wanted to go to the 360 terrace to enjoy the last views of Madrid, it was closed. Nothing informing about it prior. And was not only myself, there were quite a few other people.
The only reason I chose this hotel is for the swimming pool and the terrace - but I haven't got either - frustrating.
Positive Reviews:
The hotel is aiming for the luxury vibe - so that was quite close. My room was large and clean and had a beautiful view on to the plaza. 
The breakfast buffet was amazing.
But on the other hand, the doors have no sound isolation - so when the cleaning staff starts cleaning in the morning - you literally can hear everything.

After we survived the first night, we decided to stay in the room. Moreover, we had a very intense program in Madrid and no time for the relocation hassle. Also, I find it unusual that at such a big hotel the staff does not speak English.
Positive Reviews: Very good organization given the enormous number of guests. Breakfast was very nice. The location of the hotel is great. The access to the roof top is a big advantage. Rooms are spacious and well equipped.

Review Title: Fabulous hotel and location with beautiful roof top bar
Positive Reviews: Great location and lovely hotel. Really great access to the roof top bars and a great breakfast

Review Title: Our stay at Riu Plaza was everything you would want in a hotel.
Positive Reviews: Location, facility, security, breakfast.  When in Madrid on vacation this is the place to stay.  We started every evening with a cocktail in the rooftop bar.  On our first night, we ordered our favorite drink (Old Fashion) and held our breath.  It was perfect and that seldom happens.

Negative Reviews: Really not much. We didn’t spend much time at the hotel as we were out and about a lot.
Positive Reviews: Amazing views from the rooftop bar & pool. The hotel breakfast was great - well worth the money.

Positive Reviews:
hotel has a great atmosphere,  fantastic location, close to bars and restaurants and shops.
fantastic views from roof top bar.

Fantastic breakfast

Negative Reviews: Very busy during summer
Positive Reviews: Nice hotel in good location. Skybar is cool but it was so busy! The pool was always packed. Breakfast was good.

very spacious, felt very welcomed the moment we checked in, breakfast was amazing, the facilities were superb and the location is brilliant!

the location is very handy and the roof top bar is amazing! you get sort of priority if you’re staying at the hotel. the breakfast selection was amazing too!

Review Title: Best place to stay in Madrid

Negative Reviews: The only thing was, we didn't know that the Saturday was a Bank Holiday and places were closed.

Where to begin? Breakfast was probably the best I have ever had in similar hotels, location was at the center of the city but no noise at all, and we were just on the 7th floor. Best view in PLaza Espagna, metro station just outside the hotel, the best rooftop in the city, all in one. 
What really amazed me was the immediate hotel's response to all our needs. I don't believe any client would leave and not be satisfied.

Review Title: Superb view, very good breakfast, excellent location but....

Towels had stain on them and the floor did not feel very clean. the pool is open only in weekends.
Positive Reviews: Excellent breakfast but not fabulous. Location was perfect and the view from the room and the rooftop was breathtaking. Comfortable beds, we were upgraded for free to a family room which was pretty nice.

Review Title: terrific in every aspect - would definitely go back again
Negative Reviews: lobby was small for a property this size and very busy …

Negative Reviews: Elevators were slow. Rooftop was not very accomodating to hotel guests - no preferential treatment. Hallways and rooms were dismal and unappealing. Positive Reviews: Breakfast was great. Location is unbeatable. Bathrooms were very nice

Negative Reviews: The damn noise from some construction inside the hotel or in a building nearby. I had complain, but the reception crew said that it was outside hotel and they can’t do anything. Positive Reviews: This is an amazing place to stay in Madrid. Top quality rooms, amazing breakfast, a very central location. I will choose this place for my next staying in Madrid.

Review Title: Overall stay was good but there are a few improvements that could be made for a four star hotel
Negative Reviews: The toilet paper is disturbingly thin and the room lacks a few amenities found in other 4 star hotels such as: a coffee machine, slippers/gown and more than one towel. The gym is also very small and with the space that they have in the building could probably be Improved on.
Positive Reviews: Breakfast was very good and the beds very comfortable.  The views were exceptional!

Review Title: Super good hotel.  Location is very convenient and services provided were fantastic.
Negative Reviews: Location and the facilities

Negative Reviews: The rooftop is not for guests only , people from the outside pay to get in and it gets very busy so as a guest you cant really relax there and enjoy your drinks and beautiful views. Also the mini bar in the room was empty and they told us its because of covid which was an excuse cause other hotels have full mini bar.
Positive Reviews: The hotel is amazing. It has large modern rooms with amazing views. there is a gym open 24 hours a day and a rooftop bar with 260 view of the city. very clean and great value. Good buffet breakfast was included. i recommend this place.

Negative Reviews: Pillows and towels in room
Positive Reviews: Excellent location, great roof top bar and breakfast

Negative Reviews: Room was cold, sofa bed was uncomfortable and outside drilling noise was a disturbance.

Negative Reviews: Personnel was very kind, but I did not get why we were asked to wait for table in the restaurant when there was one free just a few meters away and the restaurant was not that full at all. Quite a few personal had been gathered at the entrance, which was not that helpful.
Positive Reviews: The hotel has excellent location near to major landmarks and attractions. The metro station is just meters away at the corner of the street and there are also buses and taxis for easy access from and to the airport and all of Madrid. Our room was not that big yet quite comfortable and with nice view. Breakfast was excellent with everything you may need for a great start of your day. The rooftop bar is a great way to finish your day with exceptional views of Madrid at night.

Review Title: Amazing stay and I can't wait to stay again!
Negative Reviews:
Not a great selection of beer, Heineken on tap is a bit meh for me. 
The sky bar access is amazing and it's great fun but we went up late one evening to get a drink and the staff were rude. I understand they're super busy but honestly not a great vibe
Positive Reviews:
Loved the location- right beside the 3 line making so much accessible around Madrid.
Adored the pool and being able to sit in the sun was amazing.
Room was spacious and comfortable 
Breakfast was so good with so much variety 

10 out of 10 would stay again

Negative Reviews: When a waiter accidently spilled a drink over my wife the floor manager could've at least made an apology as he was watching the accident , very very poor customer service.
Positive Reviews: Rooms , rooftop bar and terrace , food and hotel location were all superb.

Review Title: stunning views, great location, terrible cleaning standard and not worth the stay.
Negative Reviews:
there are a lot of negatives in this hotel, it’s too big to be properly maintained, the cleanliness is terrible, there was trash In my room, dirty rags and dirty towels, which was disgusting. there is a foul smell in the room, had to open the windows as much as I could, but I couldn’t too much because the heating was not working and the bed cover a very thin, not a warm and cozy environment. no 24h room service and the kitchen closed 1h early than informed at the front  desk. breakfast ends at 9am , which is ridiculous. there is a parking at the hotel, however it’s a very tight maze with super tiny spaces, only adequate for tiny cars. fortunately I was there for less than 12h , I could not have stayed longer, which is a shame because it could be such an amazing hotel.
I’m happy I got an amazing 60% discount on booking.com, paying the full price of the room would have been upsetting considering the conditions of the hotel.
Positive Reviews: the location is great, very central and the hotel looks impressive from the outside. the rooftop bar is lovely and the staff is very friendly. I liked how the spacious rooms and windows that can be opened. the view was amazing.
Room Type: Superior Deluxe King Room with View

Negative Reviews: I'm a Riu class member and I felt in no way diffrent/special from anybody else. In other hotels, members receive a little attention to make them feel special. Here not even a welcome drink. The room was below my expectation (small and dark). I requested a change, but all they had was a identical one so I said pass. Again, as a Riu class member, there are no extra benefits.
Positive Reviews: Hotel is right in the heart of commercial center, big and majestic, with easy access to public transport and shopping. We paid for the New Year 's eve party and we did not regreted it. The party was amazing. We had such a great time. Breakfast is also good with lots of options and staff is nice and professional.

Negative Reviews: Stayed on 21st floor. Floor with pool & event deck.  1st 2 nights were great. Quiet & peaceful. Last 3 nights - BIG events on pool deck outside facing rooms - there are only 3 rooms on this floor. Now we know why! It was HELL!!! Partying until we’ll past 1am. Staff in hallways banging and talking/ yelling until 3am!  3 nights in a row!  Horrible! Kept telling staff to be quiet. They didn’t care. Ruined the trip!!! NO SLEEP!!!
Positive Reviews:
Great staff (daytime).
Beautiful property.
Amazing breakfast.
Central location.

Review Title: Central Madrid luxury, good value stay
Negative Reviews: The swimming pool is very small. Pride was on which meant it was a bit louder than normal but not the hotel’s fault. Can’t think of anything else!
Positive Reviews: Everything! The staff were so lovely and helpful, the lift system is awesome, the breakfast was fantastic and it was really quiet and comfortable despite being so central.

Review Title: Exceptional hotel and location, disappointed not to be advised of pool closure.
Negative Reviews: The pool was closed and we were not advised of this prior to arrival or at check in. In fact I had messaged the property day before travelling to ask if we would need our own pool towels and was told they’d be provided - but not that the pool was in fact closed!
Positive Reviews: Loved the location, the staff were friendly and our terrace was magnificent. Breakfast choice was extensive and delicious.

Positive Reviews: Great location and room, staff was incredible in making everything exceptional! Breakfast is great with a wide range of variety and great quality of food.

Positive Reviews: location, rooms and breakfast

Positive Reviews: nice , clean, great location. Breakfast is excellent!

Negative Reviews: Pool was crowded and sky bar overcrowded
